I want to live my life in such a way that when I get out of bed in the morning, the devil says, 'aw shit, he's up!
author: Steve Maraboli
title: Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

quote: These were the lovely bones that had grown around my absence: the connections-sometimes tenuous, sometimes made at great cost, but often magnificent-that happened after I was gone. And I began to see things in a way that let me hold the world without me in it. The events that my death wrought were merely the bones of a body that would become whole at some unpredictable time in the future. The price of what I came to see as this miraculous body had been my life.
author: Alice Sebold
title: The Lovely Bones

quote: Gratitude builds a bridge to abundance.
author: Roy T. Bennett
title: The Light in the Heart

quote: No woman should be made to fear that she was not enough.
author: Samantha Shannon
title: The Priory of the Orange Tree

quote: Nothing's perfect, the world's not perfect. But it's there for us, trying the best it can; that's what makes it so damn beautiful.
author: Hiromu Arakawa
title: Fullmetal Alchemist, Vol. 1

quote: You were put on this earth to achieve your greatest self, to live out your purpose, and to do it courageously.
author: Steve Maraboli
title: Life, the Truth, and Being Free

quote: If a man is to shed the light of the sun upon other men, he must first of all have it within himself.
author: Romain Rolland

quote: The universe doesn’t give you what you ask for with your thoughts - it gives you what you demand with your actions.
author: Steve Maraboli
title: Life, the Truth, and Being Free

quote: Employ your time in improving yourself by other men's writings so that you shall come easily by what others have labored hard for.
author: Socrates

quote: Step follows step,
author: Gail Carson Levine
title: The Two Princesses of Bamarre

quote: Stop doing what is easy. Start doing what is right.
author: Roy T. Bennett
title: The Light in the Heart

quote: Ruin is a gift. Ruin is the road to transformation.
author: Elizabeth Gilbert
title: Eat, Pray, Love

quote: Walk with the dreamers, the believers, the courageous, the cheerful, the planners, the doers, the successful people with their heads in the clouds and their feet on the ground. Let their spirit ignite a fire within you to leave this world better than when you found it...
author: Wilferd Peterson

quote: Done is better than perfect.
author: Sheryl Sandberg
title: Lean In: Women, Work, and the Will to Lead

quote: Have regular hours for work and play; make each day both useful and pleasant, and prove that you understand the worth of time by employing it well. Then youth will bring few regrets, and life will become a beautiful success.
author: Louisa May Alcott
title: Little Women

quote: It was like the beginning of life and laughter. It was the real meaning of the sun
author: Charles Bukowski
title: Factotum

quote: To write well, express yourself like the common people, but think like a wise man.
author: Aristotle

quote: The less you associate with some people, the more your life will improve.
author: Colin Powell

quote: Don't wait for the right moment to start, start and make each moment right.
author: Roy T. Bennett
title: The Light in the Heart

quote: There, peeping among the cloud-wrack above a dark tor high up in the mountains, Sam saw a white star twinkle for a while. The beauty of it smote his heart, as he looked up out of the forsaken land, and hope returned to him. For like a shaft, clear and cold, the thought pierced him that in the end the Shadow was only a small and passing thing: there was light and high beauty for ever beyond its reach.
author: J.R.R. Tolkien
title: The Return of the King

quote: It’s important that what thoughts you are feeding into your mind because your thoughts create your belief and experiences. You have positive thoughts and you have negative ones too. Nurture your mind with positive thoughts: kindness, empathy, compassion, peace, love, joy, humility, generosity, etc. The more you feed your mind with positive thoughts, the more you can attract great things into your life.
author: Roy T. Bennett
title: The Light in the Heart

quote: Do not dare not to dare.
author: C.S. Lewis
title: The Horse and His Boy

quote: Good people see the good and bring out the best in other people.
author: Roy T. Bennett
title: The Light in the Heart

quote: It is worse to stay where one does not belong at all than to wander about lost for a while and looking for the psychic and soulful kinship one requires
author: Clarissa Pinkola Estés
title: Women Who Run With the Wolves

quote: Enjoy every step you take. If you're curious, there is always something new to be discovered in the backdrop of your daily life.
author: Roy T. Bennett
title: The Light in the Heart

quote: Love is the Answer, God is the Cure!
author: Aimee Cabo Nikolov
title: Love is the Answer God is the Cure

quote: Believe there is a great power silently working all things for good, behave yourself and never mind the rest.
author: Beatrix Potter

quote: Stay hungry. Stay foolish.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: I think that one of these days," he said, "you're going to have to find out where you want to go. And then you've got to start going there. But immediately. You can't afford to lose a minute. Not you.
author: J.D. Salinger
title: The Catcher in the Rye

quote: Good things happen in your life when you surround yourself with positive people.
author: Roy T. Bennett
title: The Light in the Heart

quote: If you enter this world knowing you are loved and you leave this world knowing the same, then everything that happens in between can be dealt with.
author: Michael  Jackson

quote: If you really want to do something, you'll find a way. If you don't, you'll find an excuse.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: I don't want to live in the kind of world where we don't look out for each other. Not just the people that are close to us, but anybody who needs a helping hand. I cant change the way anybody else thinks, or what they choose to do, but I can do my bit.
author: charles de lint

quote: The minute I stopped trying to find the right girl, and started trying to become the right guy...the girl came.
author: Jonathan Antin

quote: An eye is meant to see things.
author: Mawlana Jalal-al-Din Rumi
title: Night and Sleep

quote: Education is teaching our children to desire the right things.
author: Plato

quote: Do not let the roles you play in life make you forget who you are.
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: Reality is wrong. Dreams are for the real.
author: Tupac Shakur

quote: There is no limit to the amount of good you can do if you don't care who gets the credit.
author: Ronald Reagan

quote: I hate to say it, but shit really does happen. You just have to get over it. Beat the hell out of it by doing things that make you happy.
author: J.A. Redmerski
title: The Edge of Never

quote: 7 Effective Ways to Make Others Feel Important
author: Roy T. Bennett
title: The Light in the Heart

quote: You can love a person dear to you with a human love, but an enemy can only be loved with divine love.
author: Leo Tolstoy
title: War and Peace

quote: When things do not go your way, remember that every challenge — every adversity — contains within it the seeds of opportunity and growth.
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: Nothing will work unless you do.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: Yes, I understand why things had to happen this way. I understand his reason for causing me pain. But mere understanding does not chase away the hurt. It does not call upon the sun when dark clouds have loomed over me. Let the rain come then if it must come! And let it wash away the dust that hurt my eyes!
author: Jocelyn Soriano
title: Mend My Broken Heart

quote: Drink your tea slowly and reverently, as if it is the axis on which the world earth revolves - slowly, evenly, without rushing toward the future.
author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quote: Some people could look at a mud puddle and see an ocean with ships.
author: Zora Neale Hurston
title: Their Eyes Were Watching God

quote: Make the most of the best and the best of the worst, and keep your standards high. Never settle for anything less than you deserve or are capable of achieving.
author: Roy T. Bennett
title: The Light in the Heart

quote: Pointing to another world will never stop vice among us; shedding light over this world can alone help us.
author: Walt Whitman

quote: Be a lamp, or a lifeboat, or a ladder. Help someone's soul heal. Walk out of your house like a shepherd.
author: Rumi

quote: The pure present is an ungraspable advance of the past devouring the future. In truth, all sensation is already memory.
author: Henri Bergson
title: Matter and Memory

quote: So long as you fight the darkness, you stand in the light.
author: Sabaa Tahir
title: A Torch Against the Night

quote: You were born to stand out, stop trying to fit in.
author: Roy T. Bennett
title: The Light in the Heart

quote: But what was there to say?
author: Arundhati Roy
title: The God of Small Things

quote: Love is too precious to be ashamed of.
author: Laurell K. Hamilton
title: A Stroke of Midnight

quote: When you judge another, you do not define them, you define yourself.
author: Wayne W. Dyer

quote: You will never follow your own inner voice until you clear up the doubts in your mind.
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: It is not the failure of others to appreciate your abilities that should trouble you, but rather your failure to appreciate theirs.
author: Confucius

quote: Unconditional Love conquers all!
author: Aimee Cabo Nikolov
title: Love is the Answer God is the Cure

quote: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success. If you love what you are doing, you will be successful.
author: Albert Schweitzer

quote: Your time is way too valuable to be wasting on people that can't accept who you are.
author: Turcois Ominek

quote: Never, ever, let anyone tell you what you can and can't do. Prove the cynics wrong. Pity them for they have no imagination. The sky's the limit. Your sky. Your limit. Now. Let's dance.
author: Tom Hiddleston

quote: When I find myself in times of trouble, mother Mary comes to me,
author: Paul McCartney

quote: Mr. Franz, I think careers are a 20th century invention and I don't want one.
author: Jon Krakauer
title: Into the Wild

quote: People who lack the clarity, courage, or determination to follow their own dreams will often find ways to discourage yours. When you change for the better, the people around you will be inspired to change also....but only after doing their best to make you stop. Live your truth and don't EVER stop.
author: Steve Maraboli
title: Life, the Truth, and Being Free

quote: Everyone enjoys being acknowledged and appreciated. Sometimes even the simplest act of gratitude can change someone's entire day. Take the time to recognize and value the people around you and appreciate those who make a difference in your lives.
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: Love. Fall in love and stay in love. Write only what you love, and love what you write. The word is love. You have to get up in the morning and write something you love, something to live for.
author: Ray Bradbury

quote: Things die. But they don't always stay dead. Believe me, I know.
author: Richelle Mead
title: Frostbite

quote: Change may not always bring growth, but there is no growth without change.
author: Roy T. Bennett
title: The Light in the Heart

quote: Each suburban wife struggles with it alone. As she made the beds, shopped for groceries, matched slipcover material, ate peanut butter sandwiches with her children, chauffeured Cub Scouts and Brownies, lay beside her husband at night- she was afraid to ask even of herself the silent question-- 'Is this all?
author: Betty Friedan
title: The Feminine Mystique

quote: We are all worms, But I do believe that I am a glow worm.
author: Winston S. Churchill
title: Never Give In! The Best of Winston Churchill's Speeches

quote: When you have exhausted all possibilities, remember this - you haven't.
author: Thomas Edison

quote: Conquer the angry one by not getting angry; conquer the wicked by goodness; conquer the stingy by generosity, and the liar by speaking the truth.
author: Siddhārtha Gautama
title: The Dhammapada

quote: If you once forfeit the confidence of your fellow citizens, you can never regain their respect and esteem. It is true that you may fool all of the people some of the time; you can even fool some of the people all of the time; but you can't fool all of the people all of the time. -Speech at Clinton, Illinois, September 8, 1854.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: ...there ain't no journey what don't change you some.
author: David Mitchell
title: Cloud Atlas

quote: Looking at beauty in the world, is the first step of purifying the mind.
author: Amit Ray
title: Meditation: Insights and Inspirations

quote: Beliefs are choices. First you choose your beliefs. Then your beliefs affect your choices.
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: She had become accustomed to being lonely. She was used to walking alone and to being considered 'different.' She did not suffer too much.
author: Betty  Smith
title: A Tree Grows in Brooklyn

quote: I want to thank you, Lord, for life and all that's in it.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: Stop feeling sorry for yourself and you will be happy.
author: Stephen Fry

quote: Death, therefore, the most awful of evils, is nothing to us, seeing that, when we are, death is not come, and, when death is come, we are not.
author: Epicurus

quote: For the things we have to learn before we can do them, we learn by doing them.
author: Aristotle
title: The Nicomachean Ethics

quote: According to Aristophanes in Plato's The Banquet, in the ancient world of legend there were three types of people.
author: Haruki Murakami
title: Kafka on the Shore

quote: Sometimes you can see things happen right in front of your eyes and still jump to the wrong conclusions.
author: Jodi Picoult
title: Keeping Faith

quote: It doesn't matter if a million people tell you what you can't do, or if ten million tell you no. If you get one yes from God that's all you need.
author: Tyler Perry

quote: Ónen i-estel edain, ú-chebin estel anim.
author: J.R.R. Tolkien
title: The Return of the King

quote: Most people overestimate what they can do in one year and underestimate what they can do in ten years.
author: Bill Gates

quote: He not busy being born is busy dying.
author: Bob Dylan

quote: We can't choose our fate, but we can choose others. Be careful in knowing that.
author: J.K. Rowling
title: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix

quote: If we had no winter, the spring would not be so pleasant: if we did not sometimes taste of adversity, prosperity would not be so welcome."
author: Anne Bradstreet
title: The Works of Anne Bradstreet

quote: The tragedy of life is what dies inside a man while he lives.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Beauty is about being comfortable in your own skin. It's about knowing and accepting who you are.
author: Ellen DeGeneres
title: Seriously... I'm Kidding

quote: Fair means everyone gets what they need. And the only way to get what you need is to make it happen yourself.
author: Rick Riordan
title: The Red Pyramid

quote: When you take control of your attitude, you take control of your life.
author: Roy T. Bennett
title: The Light in the Heart

quote: What the caterpillar calls the end of the world, the master calls a butterfly.
author: Richard Bach
title: Illusions: The Adventures of a Reluctant Messiah

quote: As a single footstep will not make a path on the earth, so a single thought will not make a pathway in the mind. To make a deep physical path, we walk again and again. To make a deep mental path, we must think over and over the kind of thoughts we wish to dominate our lives.
author: Wilfred Arlan Peterson

quote: Enthusiasm can help you find the new doors, but it takes passion to open them. If you have a strong purpose in life, you don't have to be pushed. Your passion will drive you there.
author: Roy T. Bennett
title: The Light in the Heart

quote: The comfort zone is a psychological state in which one feels familiar, safe, at ease, and secure. You never change your life until you step out of your comfort zone; change begins at the end of your comfort zone.
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: Let go of something old that no longer serves you in order to make room for something new.
author: Roy T. Bennett
title: The Light in the Heart

quote: How much time he gains who does not look to see what his neighbour says or does or thinks, but only at what he does himself, to make it just and holy.
author: Marcus Aurelius
title: Meditations

quote: In prayer it is better to have a heart without words than words without a heart.
author: John Bunyan

quote: Belief, like fear or love, is a force to be understood as we understand the theory of relativity and principals of uncertainty. Phenomena that determine the course of our lives. Yesterday, my life was headed in one direction. Today, it is headed in another. Yesterday, I believe I would never have done what I did today. These forces that often remake time and space, that can shape and alter who we
author: David Mitchell
title: Cloud Atlas

quote: Once you learn to quit, it becomes a habit.
author: Vince Lombardi

quote: Each person deserves a day away in which no problems are confronted, no solutions searched for.
author: Maya Angelou
title: Wouldn't Take Nothing for My Journey Now

quote: In times of stress, the best thing we can do for each other is to listen with our ears and our hearts and to be assured that our questions are just as important as our answers.
author: Fred Rogers
title: The World According to Mister Rogers: Important Things to Remember

quote: Would you rather live one perfect day over and over or live your life with no perfect days but just decent ones?
author: Jenny Han
title: The Summer I Turned Pretty

quote: God turns you from one feeling to another and teaches by means of opposites so that you will have two wings to fly, not one
author: Rumi
title: The Essential Rumi

quote: We forfeit three-fourths of ourselves in order to be like other people.
author: Arthur Schopenhauer

quote: It only takes a split second to smile and forget, yet to someone that needed it, it can last a lifetime.
author: Steve Maraboli
title: Life, the Truth, and Being Free

quote: Surround Yourself with Positive People Who Believe in Your Dreams
author: Roy T. Bennett
title: The Light in the Heart

quote: Great leaders can see the greatness in others when they can’t see it themselves and lead them to their highest potential they don’t even know.
author: Roy T. Bennett
title: The Light in the Heart

quote: I believe in God, only I spell it Nature.
author: Frank Lloyd Wright
title: Truth Against the World: Frank Lloyd Wright Speaks for an Organic Architecture

quote: Love yourself first and everything else falls into line. Your really have to love yourself to get anything done in this world.
author: Lucille Ball

quote: To truly laugh, you must be able to take your pain, and play with it.
author: Charlie Chaplin

quote: Successful people have no fear of failure. But unsuccessful people do. Successful people have the resilience to face up to failure—learn the lessons and adapt from it.
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: The key to your happiness is to own your slippers, own who you are, own how you look, own your family, own the talents you have, and own the ones you don't. If you keep saying your slippers aren't yours, then you'll die searching, you'll die bitter, always feeling you were promised more. Not only our actions, but also our omissions, become our destiny.
author: Abraham Verghese
title: Cutting for Stone

quote: What other people think and say about you is none of your business. The most destructive thing you would ever do is to believe someone else's opinion of you. You have to stop letting other people's opinions control you.
author: Roy T. Bennett
title: The Light in the Heart

quote: Ask yourself these three questions, Tatiana Metanova, and you will know who you are. Ask: What do believe in? What do you hope for? What do you love?
author: Paullina Simons
title: The Bronze Horseman

quote: And that's when I understand that I have been stained. Whether I'm still in love with him, whether he was ever in love with me, and no matter who he's in love with now, Willem changed my life. He showed me how to get lost, and then I showed myself how to get found.
author: Gayle Forman
title: Just One Day

quote: But beauty is about finding the right fit, the most natural fit, To be perfect, you have to feel perfect about yourself --- avoid trying to be something you're not. For a goddess, that's especially hard. We can change so easily.
author: Rick Riordan
title: The Lost Hero

quote: No. Don't give up hope just yet. It's the last thing to go. When you have lost hope, you have lost everything. And when you think all is lost, when all is dire and bleak, there is always hope.
author: Pittacus Lore
title: I Am Number Four

quote: That proves you are unusual," returned the Scarecrow; "and I am convinced that the only people worthy of consideration in this world are the unusual ones. For the common folks are like the leaves of a tree, and live and die unnoticed.
author: L. Frank Baum
title: The Land of Oz

quote: I promise you nothing is as chaotic as it seems. Nothing is worth diminishing your health. Nothing is worth poisoning yourself into stress, anxiety, and fear.
author: Steve Maraboli
title: Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

quote: The only difference between you and God is that you have forgotten you are divine.
author: Dan Brown
title: The Lost Symbol

quote: Love the trees until their leaves fall off, then encourage them to try again next year.
author: Chad Sugg

quote: My heart might be bruised, but it will recover and become capable of seeing beauty of life once more. It's happened before, it will happen again, I'm sure. When someone leaves, it's because someone else is about to arrive--I'll find love again.
author: Paulo Coelho
title: The Zahir

quote: We are afraid of losing what we have, whether it's our life or our possessions and property. But this fear evaporates when we understand that our life stories and the history of the world were written by the same hand.
author: Paulo Coelho

quote: We stood there, looking at each other, saying nothing. But it was the kind of nothing that meant everything. In his eyes, there was no trace of what had happened between us earlier and I could feel something inside me break.
author: Jenny Han
title: It's Not Summer Without You

quote: Plant seeds of happiness, hope, success, and love; it will all come back to you in abundance. This is the law of nature.
author: Steve Maraboli
title: Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

quote: You need to find a way to live your life, that it doesn't make a mockery of your values.
author: Bill Ayers

quote: The greatest discovery of any generation is that a human can alter his life by altering his attitude.
author: William James

quote: Yesterday is not ours to recover, but tomorrow is ours to win or lose.
author: Lyndon B. Johnson

quote: A dead thing can go with the stream, but only a living thing can go against it.
author: G.K. Chesterton
title: The Everlasting Man

quote: Life is short. Focus on what really matters most. You have to change your priorities over time.
author: Roy T. Bennett
title: The Light in the Heart

quote: To care about your outward appearance is important, but what’s more important is to have a beautiful soul.
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: Every morning when I wake up, I experience an exquisite joy —the joy of being Salvador Dalí— and I ask myself in rapture: What wonderful things is this Salvador Dalí going to accomplish today?
author: Salvador Dalí

quote: Don't limit a child to your own learning, for she was born in another time.
author: Rabindranath Tagore

quote: It doesn't matter how many people you meet in your life; you just need the real ones who accept you for who you are and help you become who you should be.
author: Roy T. Bennett
title: The Light in the Heart

quote: If they don't like you for being yourself, be yourself even more.
author: Taylor Swift

quote: A man who does not think for himself does not think at all.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: Always believe in yourself and always stretch yourself beyond your limits. Your life is worth a lot more than you think because you are capable of accomplishing more than you know. You have more potential than you think, but you will never know your full potential unless you keep challenging yourself and pushing beyond your own self imposed limits.
author: Roy T. Bennett
title: The Light in the Heart

quote: Stop doing what is easy or popular. Start doing what is right.
author: Roy T. Bennett
title: The Light in the Heart

quote: Free at last, Free at last, Thank God almighty we are free at last.
author: Martin Luther King Jr.
title: I Have a Dream: Writings and Speeches That Changed the World

quote: Life is wasted on the living.
author: Douglas Adams
title: The Restaurant at the End of the Universe

quote: Live fast. Die young. Be wild. Have fun.
author: Lana Del Rey

quote: I choose gentleness... Nothing is won by force. I choose to be gentle. If I raise my voice may it be only in praise. If I clench my fist, may it be only in prayer. If I make a demand, may it be only of myself.
author: Max Lucado

quote: One of the best ways to influence people is to make them feel important.
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: Determine never to be idle. No person will have occasion to complain of the want of time, who never loses any. It is wonderful how much may be done, if we are always doing.
author: Thomas Jefferson
title: Letters of Thomas Jefferson

quote: If you don't love yourself, how in the hell you gonna love somebody else?
author: RuPaul

quote: If you have to dry the dishes
author: Shel Silverstein
title: A Light in the Attic

quote: Pegang tanganku, tapi jangan terlalu erat, karena aku ingin seiring dan bukan digiring.(Spasi)
author: Dee
title: Filosofi Kopi: Kumpulan Cerita dan Prosa Satu Dekade

quote: Scars are not injuries, Tanner Sack. A scar is a healing. After injury, a scar is what makes you whole.
author: China Miéville
title: The Scar

quote: If you care about what you do and work hard at it, there isn't anything you can't do if you want to.
author: Jim Henson
title: It's Not Easy Being Green: And Other Things to Consider

quote: The doubters said,
author: Bruce Lee

quote: I have frequently seen people become neurotic when they content themselves with inadequate or wrong answers to the questions of life. They seek position, marriage, reputation, outward success of money, and remain unhappy and neurotic even when they have attained what they were seeking. Such people are usually confined within too narrow a spiritual horizon. Their life has not sufficient content, sufficient meaning. If they are enabled to develop into more spacious personalities, the neurosis generally disappears.
author: C.G. Jung
title: Memories, Dreams, Reflections

quote: Associate Yourself with People Who Think Positively:
author: Roy T. Bennett
title: The Light in the Heart

quote: My past has not defined me, destroyed me, deterred me, or defeated me; it has only strengthened me.
author: Steve Maraboli
title: Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

quote: All men want, not something to do with, but something to do, or rather something to be.
author: Henry David Thoreau
title: Walden

quote: I long to accomplish a great and noble task, but it is my chief duty to accomplish small tasks as if they were great and noble.
author: Helen Keller

quote: When a stargirl cries, she sheds not tears but light.
author: Jerry Spinelli
title: Stargirl

quote: It is not uncommon for people to spend their whole life waiting to start living.
author: Eckhart Tolle
title: The Power of Now: A Guide to Spiritual Enlightenment

quote: I believe the simplest explanation is, there is no God. No one created the universe and no one directs our fate. This leads me to a profound realization that there probably is no heaven and no afterlife either. We have this one life to appreciate the grand design of the universe and for that, I am extremely grateful.
author: Stephen Hawking

quote: Freedom is a heavy load, a great and strange burden for the spirit to undertake. It is not easy. It is not a gift given, but a choice made, and the choice may be a hard one. The road goes upward towards the light; but the laden traveler may never reach the end of it.
author: Ursula K. LeGuin
title: The Tombs of Atuan

quote: To learn something new, you need to try new things and not be afraid to be wrong.
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: It doesn't matter what you do...so long as you change something from the way it was before you touched it into something that's like you after you take your hands away.
author: Ray Bradbury
title: Fahrenheit 451

quote: Children betrayed their parents by becoming their own people.
author: Leslye Walton
title: The Strange and Beautiful  Sorrows of Ava Lavender

quote: Intellectual growth should commence at birth and cease only at death.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: If you can't run, you crawl. If you can't crawl-- you find someone to carry you.
author: Joss Whedon

quote: The value of things is not the time they last, but the intensity with which they occur. That is why there are unforgettable moments and unique people!
author: Fernando Pessoa

quote: Sometimes, as we're stumbling along in the dark, we hit something good.
author: Susan Ee
title: Angelfall

quote: I try to avoid looking forward or backward, and try to keep looking upward.
author: Charlotte Bronte

quote: We all have two lives. The second one starts when we realize that we only have one.
author: Tom Hiddleston

quote: Life's like a movie, write your own ending. Keep believing, keep pretending.
author: Jim Henson

quote: You can't outwit fate by standing on the sidelines placing little sidebets about the outcome of life. either you wade in and risk everything you have to play the game or you don't play at all. and if u don't play u can't win.
author: Judith McNaught
title: Paradise

quote: I am a flawed person. A brook with many stones, a clear blue sky with many blackbirds. I have many shortcomings. A rainbow that’s not long enough, a starry night with clouds. But I can only be thankful to the God who loves me just this way, and I can only be grateful to the people in my life who accept the clear blue sky with many blackbirds and who are patient with the rainbow that isn’t long enough. And because of this, I am taught love, because of this I love my God, and I love these people.
author: C. JoyBell C.

quote: If I must fall, may it be from a high place.
author: Paulo Coelho
title: By the River Piedra I Sat Down and Wept

quote: I’ve had many enemies over the years. If there’s one thing I’ve learned, it’s never engage in a fight you’re sure to lose. On the other hand, never let anyone who has insulted you get away with it. Bide your time and strike back when you’re in a position of strength—even if you no longer need to strike back.
author: Steig Larson
title: The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo

quote: Remake the world, a little at a time, each in your own corner of the world.
author: Rick Riordan

quote: As we go through life we gradually discover who we are, but the more we discover, the more we lose ourselves.
author: Haruki Murakami
title: Colorless Tsukuru Tazaki and His Years of Pilgrimage

quote: Rock bottom became the solid foundation on which I rebuilt my life.
author: J.K. Rowling

quote: There is a time in every man's education when he arrives at the conviction that envy is ignorance; that imitation is suicide; that he must take himself for better, for worse, as his portion; that though the wide universe is full of good, no kernel of nourishing corn can come to him but through his toil bestowed on that plot of ground which is given to him to till. The power which resides in him is new in nature, and none but he knows what that is which he can do, nor does he know until he has tried.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
title: Self Reliance

quote: First you jump off the cliff and build your wings on the way down.
author: Ray Bradbury

quote: Always be yourself, there's no one better!
author: Selena Gomez

quote: You are not a victim. No matter what you have been through, you're still here. You may have been challenged, hurt, betrayed, beaten, and discouraged, but nothing has defeated you. You are still here! You have been delayed but not denied. You are not a victim, you are a victor. You have a history of victory.
author: Steve Maraboli
title: Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

quote: Just because someone desires you, it does not mean that they value you.
author: Nayyirah Waheed

quote: For Equilibrium, a Blessing:
author: John O'Donohue
title: To Bless the Space Between Us: A Book of Blessings

quote: Every day People straighten up the hair, why not the heart?
author: che guevara

quote: Seize the moments of happiness, love and be loved! That is the only reality in the world, all else is folly. It is the one thing we are interested in here.
author: Leo Tolstoy
title: War and Peace

quote: Happiness is always there. You just have to choose to see it. There's no point dwelling in the dark and ignoring the light of the stars.
author: Carrie Hope Fletcher

quote: Somehow I can't believe that there are any heights that can't be scaled by a man who knows the secrets of making dreams come true. This special secret, it seems to me, can be summarized in four Cs. They are curiosity, confidence, courage, and constancy, and the greatest of all is confidence. When you believe in a thing, believe in it all the way, implicitly and unquestionable.
author: Walt Disney

quote: I think the act of reading imbues the reader with a sensitivity toward the outside world that people who don't read can sometimes lack. I know it seems like a contradiction in terms; after all reading is such a solitary, internalizing act that it appears to represent a disengagement from day-to-day life. But reading, and particularly the reading of fiction, encourages us to view the world in new and challenging ways...It allows us to inhabit the consciousness of another which is a precursor to empathy, and empathy is, for me, one of the marks of a decent human being.
author: John Connolly
title: The Book of Lost Things

quote: Whatever you think, be sure it is what you think; whatever you want, be sure that is what you want; whatever you feel, be sure that is what you feel.
author: T.S. Eliot

quote: I cannot compromise my respect for your love. You can keep your love, I will keep my respect.
author: Amit Kalantri
title: Wealth of Words

quote: It's funny how, in this journey of life, even though we may begin at different times and places, our paths cross with others so that we may share our love, compassion, observations, and hope. This is a design of God that I appreciate and cherish.
author: Steve Maraboli
title: Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

quote: Life is essentially an endless series of problems. The solution to one problem is merely the creation of another.
author: Mark  Manson
title: The Subtle Art of Not Giving a F*ck: A Counterintuitive Approach to Living a Good Life

quote: The absence of the will to live is, alas, not sufficient to make one want to die.
author: Michel Houellebecq

quote: With great power comes great responsibility.
author: Stan Lee

quote: Consistency is the true foundation of trust. Either keep your promises or do not make them.
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: And I thought that all those little kids are going to grow up someday. And all of those little kids are going to do the things that we do. And they will all kiss someone someday. But for now, sledding is enough. I think it would be great if sledding were always enough, but it isn't.
author: Stephen Chbosky
title: The Perks of Being a Wallflower

quote: Nothing ever really goes away--it just changes into something else. Something beautiful.
author: Sarah Ockler
title: Twenty Boy Summer

quote: We dance round in a ring and suppose,
author: Robert Frost

quote: One mistake does not have to rule a person's entire life.
author: Joyce Meyer
title: Any Minute

quote: The caged bird sings with a fearful trill,
author: Maya Angelou
title: I Know Why the Caged Bird Sings

quote: The function of freedom is to free someone else.
author: Toni Morrison

quote: Deciding whether or not to trust a person is like deciding whether or not to climb a tree because you might get a wonderful view from the highest branch or you might simply get covered in sap and for this reason many people choose to spend their time alone and indoors where it is harder to get a splinter.
author: Lemony Snicket
title: The Penultimate Peril

quote: You must accept the reality of other people. You think that reality is up for negotiation, that we think it's whatever you say it is. You must accept that we are as real as you are; you must accept that you are not God.
author: J.K. Rowling
title: The Casual Vacancy

quote: Only the gentle are ever really strong.
author: James  Dean

quote: Makakapili ka ng lugar na uupuan mo, pero hindi mo mapipili ang taong uupo sa puwang sa tabi mo... Ganyan ang senaryo sa bus. Ganyan din sa pag-ibig... Lalong 'di mo kontrolado kung kelan siya bababa.
author: Bob Ong

quote: Are you on our side...and want to be different, or are you on that side and want to throw a football at my head!?
author: Gerard Way

quote: Fear robs you of your freedom to make the right choice in life that can bridge the gap between where you are and where you want to be. On the other side of fear, lies freedom. If you want to grow, you need to be brave and take risks. If you're not uncomfortable, you're not growing.
author: Roy T. Bennett
title: The Light in the Heart

quote: Life teaches us the right path is rarely the easy one.
author: Roy T. Bennett
title: The Light in the Heart

quote: Stay strong, stay positive, and never give up.
author: Roy T. Bennett
title: The Light in the Heart

quote: Gossip is just a tool to distract people who have nothing better to do from feeling jealous of those few of us still remaining with noble hearts.
author: Anna Godbersen
title: Splendor

quote: It’s strange how dreams get under your skin and give your heart a test for what’s real and what’s imaginary.
author: Jason Mraz

quote: Being Adam Parrish was a complicated thing, a wonder of muscles and organs, synapses and nerves. He was a miracle of moving parts, a study in survival. The most important thing to Adam Parrish, though, had always been free will, the ability to be his own master.
author: Maggie Stiefvater
title: The Raven Boys

quote: The splendid thing
author: Sanober Khan
title: A Thousand Flamingos

quote: What we do see depends mainly on what we look for. ... In the same field the farmer will notice the crop, the geologists the fossils, botanists the flowers, artists the colouring, sportmen the cover for the game. Though we may all look at the same things, it does not all follow that we should see them.
author: John Lubbock
title: The Beauties of Nature and the Wonders of the World We Live in

quote: Shine your light and make a positive impact on the world; there is nothing so honorable as helping improve the lives of others.
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: But why think about that when all the golden lands ahead of you and all kinds of unforseen events wait lurking to surprise you and make you glad you're alive to see?
author: Jack Kerouac
title: On the Road

quote: We do not get to choose when in our lives we feel pain," said Matthew. "It comes when it comes, and we try to remember, even though we cannot imagine a day when it will release its hold on us, that all pain fades. All misery passes. Humanity is drawn to light, not darkness.
author: Cassandra Clare
title: Chain of Gold

quote: It is during our darkest moments that we must focus to see the light.
author: Aristotle

quote: I love you, in my mind where my thoughts reside, in my heart where my emotions live, and in my soul where my dreams are born. I love you.
author: Dee Henderson
title: The Healer

quote: Chaos is more freedom; in fact, total freedom. But no meaning. I want to be free to act, and I also want my actions to mean something.
author: Audrey Niffenegger
title: The Time Traveler's Wife

quote: I have learned, that the person I have to ask for forgiveness from the most is: myself. You must love yourself. You have to forgive yourself, everyday, whenever you remember a shortcoming, a flaw, you have to tell yourself "That's just fine". You have to forgive yourself so much, until you don't even see those things anymore. Because that's what love is like.
author: C. JoyBell C.

quote: Don't give up the fight,
author: Bob Marley

quote: If you can't you must, and if you must you can.
author: Anthony Robbins

quote: No one is ever satisfied where he is.
author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry
title: The Little Prince

quote: Dream your own dreams, achieve your own goals. Your journey is your own and unique.
author: Roy T. Bennett
title: The Light in the Heart

quote: Sticking feathers up your butt does not make you a chicken!
author: Chuck Palahniuk
title: Fight Club

quote: I am not what I ought to be, I am not what I want to be, I am not what I hope to be in another world; but still I am not what I once used to be, and by the grace of God I am what I am
author: John Newton

quote: There isn't time, so brief is life, for bickerings, apologies, heartburnings, callings to account. There is only time for loving, and but an instant, so to speak, for that.
author: Mark Twain

quote: May today there be peace within.
author: Minnie Louise Haskins
title: The Gate of the Year

quote: When I hear music, I fear no danger. I am invulnerable. I see no foe. I am related to the earliest times, and to the latest.
author: HENRY DAVID THOREAU

quote: Life,” said Marvin dolefully, “loathe it or ignore it, you can’t like it.
author: Douglas Adams

quote: Written words can also sing.
author: Ngũgĩ wa Thiong’o
title: Dreams in a Time of War

quote: Listen to your life. See it for the fathomless mystery it is. In the boredom and pain of it, no less than in the excitement and gladness: touch, taste, smell your way to the holy and hidden heart of it, because in the last analysis all moments are key moments, and life itself is grace.
author: Frederick Buechner
title: NOW & THEN

quote: An individual has not started living until he can rise above the narrow confines of his individualistic concerns to the broader concerns of all humanity.
author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quote: You were not born on earth to please anyone; you have to live life to express yourself, not to impress someone. Don't pretend to be someone you're not, and never lose yourself in search of other people's acceptance and approval.
author: Roy T. Bennett
title: The Light in the Heart

quote: Be with someone who inspires you and makes you be the best version of yourself.
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: The greatest step towards a life of simplicity is to learn to let go.
author: Steve Maraboli
title: Life, the Truth, and Being Free

quote: The right thing at the wrong tme is the wrong thing.
author: Joshua Harris
title: I Kissed Dating Goodbye

quote: Awake, arise or be for ever fall’n.
author: John Milton
title: Paradise Lost

quote: Anything under God's control is never out of control.
author: Charles Swindoll

quote: There is nothing more beautiful than seeing a person being themselves. Imagine going through your day being unapologetically you.
author: Steve Maraboli
title: Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

quote: I am who I am; no more, no less.
author: Terry Goodkind
title: Wizard's First Rule

quote: Indeed, learning to write may be part of learning to read. For all I know, writing comes out of a superior devotion to reading.
author: Eudora Welty
title: On Writing

quote: Facing it, always facing it, that’s the way to get through. Face it.
author: Conrad Joseph

quote: it is impossible to build one's own happiness on the unhappiness of others. This perspective is at the heart of Buddhist teachings.
author: Daisaku Ikeda

quote: Ah, but a man's reach should exceed his grasp,
author: Robert Browning
title: Men and Women and Other Poems

quote: You don't need anybody to tell you who you are or what you are. You are what you are!
author: John Lennon

quote: Anything is possible. Anything can be.
author: Shel Silverstein

quote: You can’t go back and make a new start, but you can start right now and make a brand new ending.
author: James R. Sherman
title: Rejection

quote: If you live in a past dream, you don't enjoy what is happening right now because you will always wish it to be different than it is. There is no time to miss anyone or anything because you are alive. Not enjoying what is happening right now is living in the past and being only half alive. This leads to self pity, suffering and tears.
author: Don Miguel Ruiz
title: The Four Agreements

quote: That which we persist in doing becomes easier to do, not that the nature of the thing has changed but that our power to do has increased.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Jamie: You know what I figured out today?
author: Nicholas Sparks
title: A Walk to Remember

quote: Maybe we've lived a thousand lives before this one and in each of them we've found each other... I know I've spent each life before this one searching for you. Not someone like you but you, for your soul and mine must always come together.
author: Nicholas Sparks
title: The Notebook

quote: Great Leaders Create More Leaders
author: Roy T. Bennett
title: The Light in the Heart

quote: Do not wait: the time will never be 'just right'. Start where you stand, and work whatever tools you may have at your command and better tools will be found as you go along.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: I am what I am, an’ I’m not ashamed. 'Never be ashamed,’ my ol’ dad used ter say, ‘there’s some who’ll hold it against you, but they’re not worth botherin’ with.
author: J.K. Rowling
title: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire

quote: no matter how ugly the world gets or how stupid it shows me it is, I always have faith
author: Gerard Way

quote: A path is only a path, and there is no affront, to oneself or to others, in dropping it if that is what your heart tells you . . . Look at every path closely and deliberately. Try it as many times as you think necessary. Then ask yourself alone, one question . . . Does this path have a heart? If it does, the path is good; if it doesn't it is of no use.
author: Carlos Castaneda

quote: I give myself a good cry if I need it. But then I concentrate on the good things still in my life. I don't allow myself any more self-pity than that. A little each every morning, a few tears, and that's all.
author: Mitch Albom
title: Tuesdays with Morrie

quote: You have every right to a beautiful life.
author: Selena Gomez

quote: Every person, all the events of your life are there because you have drawn them there. What you choose to do with them is up to you.
author: Richard Bach

quote: No man ever threw away life while it was worth keeping.
author: David Hume
title: Essays on Suicide and the Immortality of the Soul

quote: The past can't hurt you anymore. Not unless you let it. They made you into a victim, Evey. They made you into a statistic. But, that's not the real you. That's not who you are inside.
author: Alan Moore
title: V for Vendetta

quote: Every choice comes with a consequence. Once you make a choice, you must accept responsibility. You cannot escape the consequences of your choices, whether you like them or not.
author: Roy T. Bennett
title: The Light in the Heart

quote: Difficulties and adversities viciously force all their might on us and cause us to fall apart, but they are necessary elements of individual growth and reveal our true potential. We have got to endure and overcome them, and move forward. Never lose hope. Storms make people stronger and never last forever.
author: Roy T. Bennett
title: The Light in the Heart

quote: How much you can learn when you fail determines how far you will go into achieving your goals.
author: Roy T. Bennett
title: The Light in the Heart

quote: Push your boundaries beyond the ordinary; be that “extra” in “extraordinary.
author: Roy T. Bennett
title: The Light in the Heart

quote: How should we be able to forget those ancient myths that are at the beginning of all peoples, the myths about dragons that at the last moment turn into princesses; perhaps all the dragons of our lives are princesses who are only waiting to see us once beautiful and brave. Perhaps everything terrible is in its deepest being something helpless that wants help from us.
author: Rainer Maria Rilke
title: Letters to a Young Poet

quote: Opinion is really the lowest form of human knowledge. It requires no accountability, no understanding. The highest form of knowledge… is empathy, for it requires us to suspend our egos and live in another’s world. It requires profound purpose larger than the self kind of understanding.
author: Bill Bullard

quote: Success is determined not by whether or not you face obstacles, but by your reaction to them. And if you look at these obstacles as a containing fence, they become your excuse for failure. If you look at them as a hurdle, each one strengthens you for the next.
author: Ben Carson
title: Gifted Hands: The Ben Carson Story

quote: Next to trying and winning, the best thing is trying and failing.
author: Lucy Maud Montgomery
title: Anne of Green Gables

quote: Myth is much more important and true than history. History is just journalism and you know how reliable that is.
author: Joseph Campbell

quote: a wind has blown the rain away & the sky away & all the leaves away, & the trees stand. i think i, too, have known autumn too long.
author: e.e. cummings

quote: We could never learn to be brave and patient if there were only joy in the world
author: Helen Keller

quote: Tolerance of intolerance is cowardice.
author: Ayaan Hirsi Ali

quote: Give up to grace. The ocean takes care of each wave 'til it gets to shore. You need more help than you know.
author: Rumi
title: Words of Paradise: Selected Poems of Rumi

quote: ...Despite the mayhem that followed, Bruno found that he was still holding Shmuel's hand in his own and nothing in the world would have persuaded him to let go.
author: John Boyne
title: The Boy in the Striped Pajamas

quote: Courage does not always roar. Sometimes courage is the quiet voice at the end of the day saying, 'I will try again tomorrow.
author: Mary Anne Radmacher

quote: You know what I can't understand? You have all these people telling you all the time how great you are, smart and funny and talented and all that, I mean endlessly, I've been telling you for years. So why don't you believe it? why do you think people say that stuff, Em? Do you think it's a conspiracy, people secretly ganging up to be nice about you?
author: David Nicholls
title: One Day

quote: Death is the easy part, the hard part is living and knowing you could be so much more then you’re willing to be.
author: robert m drake

quote: For all those that have to fight for the respect that everyone else is given without question.
author: N.K. Jemisin
title: The Fifth Season

quote: There comes a time when we realize that our parents cannot save themselves or save us, that everyone who wades through time eventually gets dragged out to sea by the undertow- that, in short, we are all going.
author: John Green
title: Looking for Alaska

quote: When your will is God's will, you will have your will.
author: Charles Spurgeon

quote: No, our science is no illusion. But an illusion it would be to suppose that what science cannot give us we can get elsewhere.
author: Sigmund Freud
title: The Future of an Illusion

quote: If the only prayer you say throughout your life is "Thank You," then that will be enough.
author: Elie Wiesel

quote: Anxiety is the handmaiden of creativity
author: T.S. Eliot

quote: Call him Voldemort, Harry. Always use the proper name for things. Fear of a name increases fear of the thing itself.
author: J.K. Rowling
title: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone

quote: To those human beings who are of any concern to me I wish suffering, desolation, sickness, ill-treatment, indignities—I wish that they should not remain unfamiliar with profound self-contempt, the torture of self-mistrust, the wretchedness of the vanquished: I have no pity for them, because I wish them the only thing that can prove today whether one is worth anything or not—that one endures.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche
title: The Will to Power

quote: It serves me right for putting all my eggs in one bastard.
author: Dorothy Parker
title: You Might As Well Live: The Life and Times of Dorothy Parker

quote: Let us live so that when we come to die even the undertaker will be sorry.
author: Mark Twain

quote: All the problem of women, starts with men. All the problem of men, ends with women.
author: Santosh Kalwar
title: Quote Me Everyday

quote: I don't know why people are afraid of lust. Then I can imagine that they are very afraid of me, for I have a great lust for everything. A lust for life, a lust for how the summer-heated street feels beneath my feet, a lust for the touch of another's skin on my skin...a lust for everything. I even lust after cake. Yes, I am very lusty and very scary.
author: C. JoyBell C.

quote: Those three things - autonomy, complexity, and a connection between effort and reward - are, most people will agree, the three qualities that work has to have if it is to be satisfying.
author: Malcolm Gladwell
title: Outliers: The Story of Success

quote: I want you to know
author: Pablo Neruda
title: If You Forget Me

quote: The further you go, the more you have to be proud of. At the same time, in order to come a long way, you have to be behind to begin with. IN the end, though maybe it's not how you reach a place that matters. Just that you get there at all.
author: Sarah Dessen
title: Lock and Key

quote: Change course, but don’t give up.
author: Roy T. Bennett
title: The Light in the Heart

quote: Do your own thing on your own terms and get what you came here for
author: Oliver James

quote: The language of Friendship is not words, but meanings.
author: Henry David Thoreau
title: A Week on the Concord and Merrimack Rivers

quote: There are not more than five musical notes, yet the combinations of these five give rise to more melodies than can ever be heard.
author: Sun Tzu
title: The Art of War

quote: Consider it: every person you have ever met, every person will suffer the loss of his friends and family. All are going to lose everything they love in this world. Why would one want to be anything but kind to them in the meantime?
author: Sam Harris
title: The End of Faith: Religion, Terror, and the Future of Reason

quote: I wish I could've lived my life without making any wrong turns. But that's impossible. A path like that doesn't exist. We fail. We trip. We get lost. We make mistakes. And little by little, one step at a time, we push forward. It's all we can do. On our own two feet.
author: Natsuki Takaya
title: Fruits Basket, Vol. 21

quote: Closing The Cycle
author: Paulo Coelho

quote: Anyone who knows me, should learn to know me again;
author: Rumi

quote: Don't marry a rich man. Marry a good man. He will spend his life trying to keep you happy. No rich man can buy that!
author: Staness Jonekos

quote: If I've learned one lesson from all that's happened to me, it's that there is no such thing as the biggest mistake of your existence. There's no such thing as ruining your life. Life's a pretty resilient thing, it turns out.
author: Sophie Kinsella
title: The Undomestic Goddess

quote: Mutual caring relationships require kindness and patience, tolerance, optimism, joy in the other's achievements, confidence in oneself, and the ability to give without undue thought of gain.
author: Fred Rogers
title: The World According to Mister Rogers: Important Things to Remember

quote: The beauty of the world...has two edges, one of laughter, one of anguish, cutting the heart asunder.
author: Virginia Woolf

quote: Early to bed and early to rise makes a man healthy, wealthy, and wise.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: A thing of beauty is a joy for ever:
author: John Keats

quote: Living well is an art that can be developed: a love of life and ability to take great pleasure from small offerings and assurance that the world owes you nothing and that every gift is exactly that, a gift.
author: Maya Angelou
title: Wouldn't Take Nothing for My Journey Now

quote: Love those you hate you.
author: Leo Tolstoy
title: Anna Karenina

quote: God is subtle but he is not malicious.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: It is not worth the while to let our imperfections disturb us always.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: Grace is the face that love wears when it meets imperfection.
author: Joseph R. Cooke

quote: When you're screwing up and nobody says anything to you anymore, that means they've given up on you.
author: Randy Pausch

quote: With your head full of brains and your shoes full of feet, you're too smart to go down any not-so-good street.
author: Dr. Seuss

quote: I wonder,” he said, “whether the stars are set alight in heaven so that one day each one of us may find his own again...
author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry
title: The Little Prince

quote: We are all of us born with a letter inside us, and that only if we are true to ourselves, may we be allowed to read it before we die.
author: Douglas Coupland

quote: If you surrendered to the air, you could ride it.
author: Toni Morrison
title: Song of Solomon

quote: If you're not comfortable enough with yourself or with your own truth when entering a relationship, then you're not ready for that relationship.
author: Steve Maraboli
title: Life, the Truth, and Being Free

quote: It is much easier to be brave if you do not know everything.
author: Lois Lowry

quote: One of the pitfalls of childhood is that one doesn't have to understand something to feel it. By the time the mind is able to comprehend what has happened, the wounds of the heart are already too deep.
author: Carlos Ruiz Zafón
title: The Shadow of the Wind

quote: that as long as we are being remembered, we remain alive.
author: Carlos Ruiz Zafon

quote: A Nation should not be judged by how it treats its highest citizens, but it's lowest ones
author: Nelson Mandela
title: Long Walk to Freedom

quote: In case you never get a second chance: don't be afraid!" "And what if you do get a second chance?" "You take it!
author: C. JoyBell C.

quote: Look at children. Of course they may quarrel, but generally speaking they do not harbor ill feelings as much or as long as adults do. Most adults have the advantage of education over children, but what is the use of an education if they show a big smile while hiding negative feelings deep inside? Children dont usually act in such a manner. If they feel angry with someone, they express it, and then it is finished. They can still play with that person the following day.
author: Dalai Lama XIV

quote: Be comforted, dear soul! There is always light behind the clouds.
author: Louisa May Alcott
title: Little Women

quote: Always forgive, but never forget, else you will be a prisoner of your own hatred, and doomed to repeat your mistakes forever.
author: Wil Zeus
title: Sun Beyond the Clouds

quote: When you take risks you learn that there will be times when you succeed and there will be times when you fail, and both are equally important.
author: Ellen DeGeneres
title: Seriously... I'm Kidding

quote: The decisions I made after that moment were not the ones she would have made. They were the choices of a changed person, a new self.
author: Tara Westover
title: Educated

quote: I believe in the immeasurable power of love; that true love can endure any circumstance and reach across any distance.
author: Steve Maraboli
title: Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

quote: Beyond work and love, I would add two other ingredients that give meaning to life. First, to fulfill whatever talents we are born with. However blessed we are by fate with different abilities and strengths, we should try to develop them to the fullest, rather than allow them to atrophy and decay. We all know individuals who did not fulfill the promise they showed in childhood. Many of them became haunted by the image of what they might have become. Instead of blaming fate, I think we should accept ourselves as we are and try to fulfill whatever dreams are within our capability.
author: Michio Kaku

quote: By hook or by crook, I hope that you will possess yourselves of money enough to travel and to idle, to contemplate the future or the past of the world, to dream over books and loiter at street corners and let the line of thought dip deep into the stream
author: Virginia Woolf

quote: The purpose of literature is to turn blood into ink.
author: T.S. Eliot

quote: What we achieve inwardly will change outer reality.
author: Otto Rank

quote: Make voyages. Attempt them. There's nothing else.
author: Tennesse Williams
title: Camino Real

quote: In our world," said Eustace, "a star is a huge ball of flaming gas."
author: C.S. Lewis
title: The Voyage of the Dawn Treader

quote: The harder you fall, the heavier your heart; the heavier your heart, the stronger you climb; the stronger you climb, the higher your pedestal.
author: Criss Jami
title: Killosophy

quote: Dream, Dream Dream
author: APJ ABDUL KALAM

quote: Collective madness is called sanity ..
author: Paulo Coelho
title: Veronika Decides to Die

quote: I do not believe that sheer suffering teaches. If suffering alone taught, all the world would be wise, since everyone suffers. To suffering must be added mourning, understanding, patience, love, openness, and the willingness to remain vulnerable.
author: Anne Morrow Lindbergh
title: Gift from the Sea

quote: Great men are like eagles, and build their nest on some lofty solitude
author: Arthur Schopenhauer

quote: No one has ever achieved greatness without dreams.
author: Roy T. Bennett
title: The Light in the Heart

quote: The most exquisite paradox… as soon as you give it all up, you can have it all. As long as you want power, you can't have it. The minute you don't want power, you'll have more than you ever dreamed possible.
author: ram dass

quote: Free yourself from the complexities and drama of your life. Simplify. Look within. Within ourselves we all have the gifts and talents we need to fulfill the purpose we've been blessed with.
author: Steve Maraboli
title: Life, the Truth, and Being Free

quote: Live boldly. Push yourself. Don't settle.
author: Jojo Moyes
title: Me Before You

quote: Millions saw the apple fall, Newton was the only one who asked why?
author: Bernard M. Baruch

quote: What if I mess up?"
author: Victoria Schwab
title: The Archived

quote: We judge ourselves by what we feel capable of doing, while others judge us by what we have already done.
author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quote: All the time you're saying to yourself, 'I could do that, but I won't,' — which is just another way of saying that you can't.
author: Richard P. Feynman
title: Surely You're Joking, Mr. Feynman!: Adventures of a Curious Character

quote: We hunt the flame, the light in the darkness, the good this world deserves.
author: Hafsah Faizal
title: We Hunt the Flame

quote: If it sounds like writing, I rewrite it.
author: Elmore Leonard
title: Elmore Leonard's 10 Rules of Writing

quote: Don't find fault, find a remedy; anybody can complain
author: Henry Ford

quote: Life will hit you hard in the face, wait for you to get back up just so it can kick you in the stomach. But getting the wind knocked out of you is the only way to remind your lungs how much they like the taste of air.
author: Sarah Kay

quote: Laughter is carbonated holiness.
author: Anne Lamott

quote: Do your best and let God do the rest.
author: Ben Carson

quote: We travel, initially, to lose ourselves; and we travel, next to find ourselves. We travel to open our hearts and eyes and learn more about the world than our newspapers will accommodate. We travel to bring what little we can, in our ignorance and knowledge, to those parts of the globe whose riches are differently dispersed. And we travel, in essence, to become young fools again- to slow time down and get taken in, and fall in love once more.
author: Pico Iyer

quote: Love art in yourself, and not yourself in art.
author: Constantin Stanislavski
title: My Life In Art

quote: Wahai, wanita-wanita yang hingga usia tiga puluh, empat puluh, atau lebih dari itu, tapi belum juga menikah (mungkin kerana kekurangan fizikal, tidak ada kesempatan, atau tidak pernah 'terpilih' di dunia yang amat keterlaluan mencintai harta dan penampilan wajah.) Yakinlah, wanita-wanita solehah yang sendiri, namun tetap mengisi hidupnya dengan indah, bersedekah dan berkongsi, berbuat baik dan bersyukur. Kelak di hari akhir sungguh akan menjadi bidadari-bidadari syurga. Dan khabar baik itu pastilah benar, bidadari syurga parasnya cantik luar biasa.
author: Tere Liye
title: Bidadari Bidadari Surga

quote: Love demands everything, they say, but my love demands only this: that no matter what happens or how long it takes, you`ll keep faith in me, you`ll remember who we are, and you`ll never feel despair.
author: Ann Brashares
title: My Name Is Memory

quote: A winner is a dreamer who never gives up
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: My heart, which is so full to overflowing, has often been solaced and refreshed by music when sick and weary.
author: Martin Luther

quote: Find a purpose to serve, not a lifestyle to live.
author: Criss Jami
title: Venus in Arms

quote: Failures are the stairs we climb to reach success.
author: Roy T. Bennett
title: The Light in the Heart

quote: Two things fill the mind with ever-increasing wonder and awe, the more often and the more intensely the mind of thought is drawn to them: the starry heavens above me and the moral law within me.
author: Immanuel Kant
title: Critique of Practical Reason

quote: If I had to choose between betraying my country and betraying my friend, I hope I should have the guts to betray my country.
author: E.M. Forster
title: What I Believe and Other Essays

quote: You can have everything you want if you can put your heart and soul into everything you do.
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: I want to continue being crazy; living my life the way I dream it, and not the way the other people want it to be.
author: Paulo Coelho
title: Veronika Decides to Die

quote: Today is a new day. Don't let your history interfere with your destiny! Let today be the day you stop being a victim of your circumstances and start taking action towards the life you want. You have the power and the time to shape your life. Break free from the poisonous victim mentality and embrace the truth of your greatness. You were not meant for a mundane or mediocre life!
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: If it can be destroyed by the truth, it deserves to be destroyed by the truth.
author: Carl Sagan

quote: Create a vision for the life you really want and then work relentlessly towards making it a reality.
author: Roy T. Bennett
title: The Light in the Heart

quote: Yes, I have tricks in my pocket, I have things up my sleeve. But I am the opposite of a stage magician. He gives you illusion that has the appearance of truth. I give you truth in the pleasant disguise of illusion.
author: Tennessee Williams
title: The Glass Menagerie

quote: I advise you to stop sharing your dreams with people who try to hold you back, even if they're your parents. Because, if you're the kind of person who senses there's something out there for you beyond whatever it is you're expected to do - if you want to be EXTRA-ordinary- you will not get there by hanging around a bunch of people who tell you you're not extraordinary. Instead, you will probably
author: Kelly Cutrone
title: If You Have to Cry, Go Outside: And Other Things Your Mother Never Told You

quote: Sometimes I arrive just when God's ready to have somone click the shutter.
author: Ansel Adams

quote: You know, the mind is a remarkable thing. Just because you can't see the wound doesn't mean it isn't hurting. It scars all the time, but it heals.
author: Jodi Picoult
title: The Pact

quote: If someone does not want me it is not the end of the world. But if I do not want me, the world is nothing but endings.
author: Nayyirah Waheed

quote: You are never too old to set another goal, or to dream a new dream.
author: Les Brown
title: Live Your Dreams

quote: You have to, take a deep breath. and allow the music to flow through you. Revel in it, allow yourself to awe. When you play allow the music to break your heart with its beauty.
author: Kelly White

quote: When we blindly adopt a religion, a political system, a literary dogma, we become automatons.
author: Anaïs Nin
title: The Diary of Anaïs Nin, Vol. 4: 1944-1947

quote: What's most important in a friendship? Tolerance and loyalty.
author: J.K. Rowling

quote: Do not pray for easy lives. Pray to be stronger men.
author: John F. Kennedy

quote: Just because you fall once, doesn't mean you're fall at everything. Keep trying, hold on, and always trust yourself, because if you don't then who will??
author: Marilyn Monroe

quote: I don't know, I don't want to talk as much. (...) It's nicer to think dear, pretty thoughts and keep them in one's heart, like treasures. I don't like to have them laughed at or wondered over.
author: L.M. Montgomery
title: Anne of Green Gables

quote: Quiet people have the loudest minds.
author: Stephen King

quote: Nikolai had been told that hope was dangerous, had been warned of it many times. But he’d never believed that. Hope was the wind that came from nowhere to fill your sails and carry you home.
author: Leigh Bardugo
title: King of Scars

quote: All changes, even the most longed for, have their melancholy; for what we leave behind us is a part of ourselves; we must die to one life before we can enter another.
author: Anatole France
title: The Crime of Sylvestre Bonnard

quote: How would your life be different if…You stopped worrying about things you can’t control and started focusing on the things you can? Let today be the day…You free yourself from fruitless worry, seize the day and take effective action on things you can change.
author: Steve Maraboli
title: Life, the Truth, and Being Free

quote: Have you ever seen the stars in the night? See them closely, they will tell you, how to be open, how to love and how to shine and twinkle without any differences and jealousy of other stars.
author: Santosh Kalwar
title: Quote Me Everyday

quote: You should never assume. You know what happens when you assume. You make an ass out of you and me because that's how it's spelled.
author: Ellen DeGeneres

quote: Why are you trying so hard to fit in when you were born to stand out?
author: Ian Wallace

quote: Believe in yourself and there will come a day when others will have no choice but to believe with you.
author: Cynthia Kersey

quote: May I share with you a formula that in my judgment will help you and help me to journey well through mortality... First, fill your mind with truth; second, fill your life with service; and third, fill your heart with love.
author: Thomas S. Monson

quote: To write is human, to edit is divine.
author: Stephen King
title: On Writing: A Memoir of the Craft

quote: Take wrong turns. Talk to strangers. Open unmarked doors. And if you see a group of people in a field, go find out what they are doing. Do things without always knowing how they'll turn out. You're curious and smart and bored, and all you see is the choice between working hard and slacking off. There are so many adventures that you miss because you're waiting to think of a plan. To find them, look for tiny interesting choices. And remember that you are always making up the future as you go.
author: Randall Munroe
title: xkcd: volume 0

quote: Once upon a time, there was a wise man who used to go to the ocean to do his writing. He had a habit of walking on the beach before he began his work.
author: Loren Eiseley

quote: Your daughter is ugly.
author: Warsan Shire

quote: Be an Encourager: When you encourage others, you boost their self-esteem, enhance their self-confidence, make them work harder, lift their spirits and make them successful in their endeavors. Encouragement goes straight to the heart and is always available. Be an encourager. Always.
author: Roy T. Bennett
title: The Light in the Heart

quote: I'm beginning to think that maybe it's not just how much you love someone. Maybe what matters is who you are when you're with them.
author: Anne Tyler
title: The Accidental Tourist

quote: You can have many great ideas in your head, but what makes the difference is the action. Without action upon an idea, there will be no manifestation, no results, and no reward
author: Don Miguel Ruiz
title: The Four Agreements

quote: No matter how much experience you have, there’s always something new you can learn and room for improvement.
author: Roy T. Bennett
title: The Light in the Heart

quote: People would rather believe than know.
author: Edward O. Wilson

quote: Sit down before fact as a little child, be prepared to give up every preconceived notion, follow humbly wherever and to whatever abysses nature leads, or you shall learn nothing. I have only begun to learn content and peace of mind since I have resolved at all risks to do this.
author: Thomas Huxley
title: Life and Letters of Thomas Henry Huxley — Volume 1

quote: Realize deeply that the present moment is all you will ever have.
author: Eckhart Tolle

quote: It was the moment I realized what music can do to people, how it can make you hurt and feel so good all at once.
author: Nina LaCour
title: Hold Still

quote: Do not give way to useless alarm; though it is right to be prepared for the worst, there is no occasion to look on it as certain.
author: Jane Austen
title: Pride and Prejudice

quote: In the end, just three things matter:
author: Jack Kornfield

quote: We ask ourselves, who am I to be brilliant, gorgeous, handsome, talented and fabulous? Actually, who are you not to be?
author: Marianne Williamson
title: A Return to Love: Reflections on the Principles of "A Course in Miracles"

quote: Be where you are, stop over-thinking, and focus on what you are doing.
author: Roy T. Bennett
title: The Light in the Heart

quote: To be in your children's memories tomorrow,
author: Barbara Johnson

quote: It takes a huge effort to free yourself from memory
author: Paulo Coelho
title: Aleph

quote: I think joy and sweetness and affection are a spiritual path. We're here to know God, to love and serve God, and to be blown away by the beauty and miracle of nature. You just have to get rid of so much baggage to be light enough to dance, to sing, to play. You don't have time to carry grudges; you don't have time to cling to the need to be right.
author: Anne Lamott

quote: Do not waste time bothering whether you ‘love’ your neighbor; act as if you did. As soon as we do this we find one of the great secrets. When you are behaving as if you loved someone, you will presently come to love him.
author: C. S.  Lewis
title: Mere Christianity

quote: ...even a tiny bit of deceit is dishonorable when it's used for selfish or cowardly reasons.
author: Jeanne Birdsall
title: The Penderwicks on Gardam Street

quote: Everyone has his own reality in which, if one is not too cautious, timid or frightened, one swims. This is the only reality there is.
author: Henry Miller
title: Stand Still Like the Hummingbird

quote: If a bullet should enter my brain, let that bullet destroy every closet door.
author: Harvey Milk

quote: Although I am a typical loner in my daily life, my awareness of belonging to the invisible community of those who strive for truth, beauty, and justice has prevented me from feelings of isolation.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Life is painful. It has thorns, like the stem of a rose. Culture and art are the roses that bloom on the stem. The flower is yourself, your humanity. Art is the liberation of the humanity inside yourself.
author: Daisaku Ikeda

quote: Happiness is a choice that requires effort at times.
author: Aeschylus

quote: Arrange whatever pieces come your way.
author: Virginia Woolf
title: A Writer's Diary

quote: Berhenti bercita-cita adalah tragedi terbesar dalam hidup manusia
author: Andrea Hirata
title: Sang Pemimpi

quote: After sleeping through a hundred million centuries we have finally opened our eyes on a sumptuous planet, sparkling with color, bountiful with life. Within decades we must close our eyes again. Isn’t it a noble, an enlightened way of spending our brief time in the sun, to work at understanding the universe and how we have come to wake up in it? This is how I answer when I am asked—as I am surprisingly often—why I bother to get up in the mornings.
author: Richard Dawkins

quote: I am not a smart man, particularly, but one day, at long last, I stumbled from the dark woods of my own, and my family's, and my country's past, holding in my hands these truths: that love grows from the rich loam of forgiveness; that mongrels make good dogs; that the evidence of God exists in the roundness of things. This much, at least, I've figured out. I know this much is true.
author: Wally Lamb
title: I Know This Much Is True

quote: A man, though wise, should never be ashamed of learning more, and must unbend his mind.
author: Sophocles
title: Antigone

quote: All shall be done, but it may be harder than you think.
author: C.S. Lewis
title: The Lion, the Witch and the Wardrobe

quote: The man who writes about himself and his own time is the only man who writes about all people and all time.
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: That's everyone's dream, isn't it, really? Instead of many who give you little pieces of themselves-one who gives you everything.
author: Cassandra Clare
title: Chain of Gold

quote: God save us from religion.
author: David Eddings

quote: Man cannot possess anything as long as he fears death. But to him who does not fear it, everything belongs. If there was no suffering, man would not know his limits, would not know himself.
author: Leo Tolstoy
title: War and Peace

quote: It is only with true love and compassion that we can begin to mend what is broken in the world. It is these two blessed things that can begin to heal all broken hearts.
author: Steve Maraboli
title: Life, the Truth, and Being Free

quote: I think the reason we sometimes have the false sense that God is so far away is because that is where we have put him. We have kept him at a distance, and then when we are in need and call on him in prayer, we wonder where he is. He is exactly where we left him.
author: Ravi Zacharias
title: Has Christianity Failed You?

quote: I am no king, and I am no lord,
author: Peter S. Beagle
title: The Last Unicorn

quote: Do not let your negative thoughts have power over you because those thoughts will end up controlling your life. No one can live a positive life with a negative mind.
