author: Roy T. Bennett
title: The Light in the Heart

quote: Everything changed the day she figured out there was exactly enough time for the important things in her life.
author: Brian Andreas

quote: Everything happens for a reason and, something better will come along for me!
author: Selena Gomez

quote: Nothing's a better cure for writer's block than to eat ice cream right out of the carton.
author: Don Roff

quote: Focus on making yourself better, not on thinking that you are better.
author: Bohdi Sanders
title: The Secrets of Worldly Wisdom: Your Key to Unlocking Success

quote: It's just that in the Deep South, women learn at a young age that when the world is falling apart around you, it's time to take down the drapes and make a new dress.
author: Karen Moning
title: Faefever

quote: The most important words a man can say are, “I will do better.” These are not the most important words any man can say. I am a man, and they are what I needed to say.
author: Brandon Sanderson
title: Oathbringer

quote: What saves a man is to take a step. Then another step.
author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

quote: Frustration and Love can’t exist in the same place at the same time, so get real and start doing what you would rather be doing in life. Love your life. All of it. Even the heavy shit that happened to you when you were 8. All of it was and IS perfect.
author: Jason Mraz

quote: I hate you."
author: Stephen Chbosky
title: The Perks of Being a Wallflower

quote: Those with a grateful mindset tend to see the message in the mess. And even though life may knock them down, the grateful find reasons, if even small ones, to get up.
author: Steve Maraboli
title: Life, the Truth, and Being Free

quote: This place is a dream. Only a sleeper considers it real. Then death comes like dawn, and you wake up laughing at what you thought was your grief.
author: Rumi

quote: It is better for the heart to break, than not to break.
author: Mary Oliver

quote: A gift is pure when it is given from the heart to the right person at the right time and at the right place, and when we expect nothing in return
author: Anonymous
title: The Bhagavad Gita

quote: Passion is a feeling that tells you: this is the right thing to do. Nothing can stand in my way. It doesn't matter what anyone else says. This feeling is so good that it cannot be ignored. I'm going to follow my bliss and act upon this glorious sensation of joy.
author: Wayne W. Dyer

quote: I find it odd- the greed of mankind. People only like you for as long as they perceive they can get what they want from you. Or for as long as they perceive you are who they want you to be. But I like people for all of their changing surprises, the thoughts in their heads, the warmth that changes to cold and the cold that changes to warmth... for being human. The rawness of being human delights me.
author: C. JoyBell C.

quote: Where you stumble and fall, there you will find gold.
author: Joseph Campbell

quote: Life is short. If you doubt me, ask a butterfly. Their average life span is a mere five to fourteen days.
author: Ellen DeGeneres
title: The Funny Thing Is...

quote: WATNEY: Look! A pair of boobs! -> (.Y.).
author: Andy Weir
title: The Martian

quote: Write while the heat is in you. The writer who postpones the recording of his thoughts uses an iron which has cooled to burn a hole with. He cannot inflame the minds of his audience.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: When you lose your smile, you lose your way in the chaos of life.
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: I've had it with being nice, understanding, fair and hopeful. I feel like being negative all day. The chip on my shoulder could sink the QE2. I've got an attitude problem and nobody better get in my way...I'm in a bad mood and the whole stupid little world is gonna pay!
author: John Waters
title: Crackpot: The Obsessions of John Waters

quote: You can only be afraid of what you think you know.
author: J. Krishnamurti

quote: But in the end it's only a passing thing, this shadow; even darkness must pass.
author: J.R.R. Tolkien
title: The Lord of the Rings

quote: The heights by great men reached and kept were not attained by sudden flight,
author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quote: How satisfying it is to leave a mark on a blank surface. To make a map of my movement - no matter how temporary.
author: Craig Thompson
title: Blankets

quote: I ask of you your lives,” Elend said, voice echoing, “and your courage. I ask of you your faith, and your honor—your strength, and your compassion. For today, I lead you to die. I will not ask you to welcome this event. I will not insult you by calling it well, or just, or even glorious. But I will say this.
author: Brandon Sanderson
title: The Hero of Ages

quote: When they say the sky's the limit to me that's really true
author: Michael  Jackson

quote: Everything you want is on the other side of fear.
author: Jack Canfield

quote: We humans do not understand compassion. In each moment of our lives, we betray it. Aye, we know of its worth, yet in knowing we then attach to it a value, we guard the giving of it, believing it must be earned, T’lan Imass. Compassion is priceless in the truest sense of the word. It must be given freely. In abundance.
author: Steven Erikson
title: Memories of Ice

quote: Light a candle instead of cursing the darkness.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt
title: This is My Story

quote: I was born into Bolívar's labyrinth, and so I must believe in the hope of Rabelais' Great Perhaps.
author: John Green

quote: Your Life Is Happening Right Now: Don't let procrastination take over your life. Be brave and take risks. Your life is happening right now.
author: Roy T. Bennett
title: The Light in the Heart

quote: I'd like to add some beauty to life," said Anne dreamily. "I don't exactly want to make people KNOW more... though I know that IS the noblest ambition... but I'd love to make them have a pleasanter time because of me... to have some little joy or happy thought that would never have existed if I hadn't been born.
author: L.M. Montgomery
title: Anne's House of Dreams

quote: The deepest secret is that life is not a process of discovery, but a process of creation. You are not discovering yourself, but creating yourself anew. Seek therefore, not to find out Who You Are, but seek to determine Who You Want to Be.
author: Neale Donald Walsch

quote: Remind thyself, in the darkest moments, that every failure is only a step toward success, every detection of what is false directs you toward what is true, every trial exhausts some tempting form of error, and every adversity will only hide, for a time, your path to peace and fulfillment.
author: Og Mandino

quote: Am I weird?"
author: Stephen King
title: The Body

quote: You can't find someone who doesn't want to be found.
author: Isabel Allende
title: The House of the Spirits

quote: To invent your own life's meaning is not easy, but it's still allowed, and I think you'll be happier for the trouble.
author: Bill Watterson

quote: Every time you do a good deed you shine the light a little farther into the dark. And the thing is, when you're gone that light is going to keep shining on, pushing the shadows back.
author: charles de lint

quote: Pac said Thug Life stood for 'The Hate U Give Little Infants Fucks Everybody'.
author: Angie Thomas
title: The Hate U Give

quote: Know from whence you came. If you know whence you came, there are absolutely no limitations to where you can go.
author: James Baldwin

quote: When obstacles arise, you change your direction to reach your goal; you do not change your decision to get there.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: Never let a problem to be solved, become more important than a person to be loved.
author: Thomas S. Monson

quote: Maybe you think you’ll be entitled to more happiness later by forgoing all of it now, but it doesn’t work that way. Happiness takes as much practice as unhappiness does. It’s by living that you live more. By waiting you wait more. Every waiting day makes your life a little less. Every lonely day makes you a little smaller. Every day you put off your life makes you less capable of living it.
author: Ann Brashares
title: Sisterhood Everlasting

quote: Don't waste your energy trying to change opinions ... Do your thing, and don't care if they like it.
author: Tina Fey
title: Bossypants

quote: I consider myself a stained-glass window. And this is how I live my life. Closing no doors and covering no windows; I am the multi-colored glass with light filtering through me, in many different shades. Allowing light to shed and fall into many many hues. My job is not to direct anything, but only to filter into many colors. My answer is destiny and my guide is joy. And there you have me.
author: C. JoyBell C.

quote: If you care about something enough, you'll find a way to make it happen.
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: There's a hunger for stories in all of us, adults too. We need stories so much that we're even willing to read bad books to get them, if the good books won't supply them.
author: Philip Pullman

quote: It's your life-but only if you make it so.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt
title: You Learn by Living: Eleven Keys for a More Fulfilling Life

quote: Sometimes I go to God and say, "God, if Thou dost never answer another prayer while I live on this earth, I will still worship Thee as long as I live and in the ages to come for what Thou hast done already. God’s already put me so far in debt that if I were to live one million millenniums I couldn’t pay Him for what He’s done for me.
author: A.W. Tozer

quote: No man is brave that has never walked a hundred miles. If you want to know the truth of who you are, walk until not a person knows your name. Travel is the great leveler, the great teacher, bitter as medicine, crueler than mirror-glass. A long stretch of road will teach you more about yourself than a hundred years of quiet.
author: Patrick Rothfuss

quote: A thousand words leave not the same deep impression as does a single deed.
author: Henrik Ibsen

quote: It's a lie to think you're not good enough. It's a lie to think you're not worth anything.
author: Nick Vujicic

quote: No matter how hard life is, don't lose hope
author: Zayn Malik

quote: Everything stinks till it’s finished.
author: Dr. Seuss

quote: There is no more profitable investment than investing in yourself. It is the best investment you can make; you can never go wrong with it. It is the true way to improve yourself to be the best version of you and lets you be able to best serve those around you.
author: Roy T. Bennett
title: The Light in the Heart

quote: To overcome fear is the quickest way to gain your self-confidence.
author: Roy T. Bennett
title: The Light in the Heart

quote: I’ve gotta get out of the basement. I’ve gotta see the world. I’ve gotta make a difference
author: Gerard Way

quote: What did you do?” I mumble. He is just a few feet away from me now, but not close enough to hear me. As he passes me he stretches out his hand. He wraps it around my palm and squeezes. Squeezes, then lets go. His eyes are bloodshot; he is pale. “What did you do?” This time the question tears from my throat like a growl. I throw myself toward him, struggling against Peter’s grip, though his hands chafe. “What did you do?” I scream. “You die, I die too” Tobias looks over his shoulder at me. “I asked you not to do this. You made your decision. These are the repercussions.
author: Veronica Roth

quote: Be careful the stories you're telling yourself about your current circumstances; a head full of negative thoughts has no space for positive ones.
author: Roy T. Bennett
title: The Light in the Heart

quote: Be not angry that you cannot make others as you wish them to be, since you cannot make yourself as you wish to be.
author: Thomas à Kempis
title: The Imitation of Christ

quote: Wanderer, your footsteps are the road, and nothing more; wanderer, there is no road, the road is made by walking. By walking one makes the road, and upon glancing behind one sees the path that never will be trod again. Wanderer, there is no road-- Only wakes upon the sea.
author: Antonio Machado
title: Campos de Castilla

quote: The greatest day in your life and mine is when we take total responsibility for our attitudes. That's the day we truly grow up.
author: John C. Maxwell

quote: But we never get back our youth… The pulse of joy that beats in us at twenty becomes sluggish. Our limbs fail, our senses rot. We degenerate into hideous puppets, haunted by the memory of the passions of which we were too much afraid, and the exquisite temptations that we had not the courage to yield to.
author: Oscar Wilde
title: The Picture of Dorian Gray

quote: She had been given a wonderful gift: life. Sometimes it was cruelly taken away too soon, but it's what you did with it that counted, not how long it lasted.
author: Cecelia Ahern
title: P.S. I Love You

quote: When forever becomes a place...when forever ceases to be just a word… when it ceases to be just a measurement of time…but instead becomes a place where soul mates can dance to the song in their hearts... that is a reflection of true love.
author: Steve Maraboli
title: Life, the Truth, and Being Free

quote: Your own Self-Realization is the greatest service you can render the world.
author: Ramana Maharshi

quote: Not everything is supposed to become something beautiful and long-lasting. Sometimes people come into your life to show you what is right and what is wrong, to show you who you can be, to teach you to love yourself, to make you feel better for a little while, or to just be someone to walk with at night and spill your life to. Not everyone is going to stay forever, and we still have to keep on going and thank them for what they’ve given us.
author: Emery Allen

quote: These mountains that you are carrying, you were only supposed to climb.
author: Najwa Zebian

quote: We're so engaged in doing things to achieve purposes of outer value that we forget the inner value, the rapture that is associated with being alive, is what it is all about.
author: Joseph Campbell
title: The Power of Myth

quote: Before a dream is realized, the Soul of the World tests everything that was learned along the way. It does this not because it is evil, but so that we can, in addition to realizing our dreams, master the lessons we’ve learned as we’ve moved toward that dream. That’s the point at which most people give up. It’s the point at which, as we say in the language of the desert, one 'dies of thirst just when the palm trees have appeared on the horizon.
author: Paulo Coelho
title: The Alchemist

quote: There is no failure except in no longer trying.
author: Elbert Hubbard

quote: Yoga is not a religion. It is a science, science of well-being, science of youthfulness, science of integrating body, mind and soul.
author: Amit Ray
title: Yoga and Vipassana: An Integrated Life Style

quote: I'm not going to limit myself just because people won't accept the fact that I can do something else.
author: Dolly Parton

quote: life is truly known only to those who suffer, lose, endure adversity, & stumble from defeat to defeat.
author: anaïs nin

quote: She's a woman, you're a dude. You're not
author: Neal Stephenson
title: Snow Crash

quote: Men and women who turn their lives over to God will discover that He can make a lot more out of their lives than they can. He can deepen their joys, expand their vision, quicken their minds, strengthen their muscles, lift their spirits, multiply their blessings, increase their opportunities, comfort their souls, and pour out peace.
author: Ezra Taft Benson

quote: I don’t chase after anyone, If you wanna walk out of my life, then I’ll hold the fucking door open for you.
author: Wiz Khalifa

quote: Every problem is a gift - without problems we would not grow.
author: Anthony Robbins

quote: One of the penalties of an ecological education is that one lives alone in a world of wounds. Much of the damage inflicted on land is quite invisible to laymen. An ecologist must either harden his shell and make believe that the consequences of science are none of his business, or he must be the doctor who sees the marks of death in a community that believes itself well and does not want to be told otherwise.
author: Aldo Leopold
title: A Sand County Almanac

quote: Talent is a gift, but character is a choice.
author: John C. Maxwell

quote: There's some good in this world, Mr. Frodo, and it's worth fighting for.
author: J. R. R. Tolkien

quote: We are the cosmos made conscious and life is the means by which the universe understands itself.
author: Brian Cox

quote: My only regrets are the moments when i doubted myself and took the safe route. Life is too short to waste time being unhappy.
author: Dan Howell

quote: I'm starting with the man in the mirror,
author: Michael  Jackson

quote: A man may die, nations may rise and fall, but an idea lives on. Ideas have endurance without death.
author: John F. Kennedy

quote: We need to help people to discover the true meaning of love. Love is generally confused with dependence. Those of us who have grown in true love know that we can love only in proportion to our capacity for independence.
author: Fred Rogers
title: The World According to Mister Rogers: Important Things to Remember

quote: You've got to show the world who you are before it tells you. Otherwise you become victim to someone you're not.
author: Chris Colfer
title: Struck By Lightning: The Carson Phillips Journal

quote: Tearing down the rest of the world won't make you happy. Look inside yourself. Because finding who you were meant to be? What you were put into this world to do? That's what fills the emptiness. It's the only things that can.
author: A.G. Howard
title: Splintered

quote: One life is all we have and we live it as we believe in living it. But to sacrifice what you are and to live without belief, that is a fate more terrible than dying.
author: Joan of Arc

quote: I am the captain of my soul.
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: This is the key to life: To expect everything to be given to you from above, yet to be genuinely surprised and forever grateful, when they are. Expecting all good things to be yours, while not knowing how to take anything for granted. If there may be a key in life, this is the key.
author: C. JoyBell C.

quote: The deeds you do may be the only sermon some persons will hear today
author: St. Francis Of Assisi

quote: Perfect is the enemy of good.
author: Voltaire

quote: Ten spears go to battle," he whispered, "and nine shatter. Did the war
author: Brandon Sanderson
title: Oathbringer

quote: If you are under the impression you have already perfected yourself, you will never rise to the heights you are no doubt capable of.
author: Kazuo Ishiguro
title: The Remains of the Day

quote: Argue for your limitations and, sure enough, they're yours.
author: Richard Bach
title: Illusions: The Adventures of a Reluctant Messiah

quote: The trick is to enjoy life. Don't wish away your days, waiting for better ones ahead.
author: Marjorie Pay Hinckley

quote: There is great change to be experienced once you learn the power of letting go. Stop allowing anyone or anything to control, limit, repress, or discourage you from being your true self! Today is YOURS to shape - own it - break free from people and things that poison or dilute your spirit.
author: Steve Maraboli
title: Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

quote: Destiny is real. And she's not mild-mannered. She will come around and hit you in the face and knock you over and before you know what hit you, you're naked- stripped of everything you thought you knew and everything you thought you didn't know- and there you are! A bloody nose, bruises all over you, and naked. And it's the most beautiful thing.
author: C. JoyBell C.

quote: The point of stories is not that they are objectively true, but that the soul of the story is truer than reality. Those who mock fiction do so because they fear the truth.
author: Cassandra Clare
title: Chain of Gold

quote: As soon as you honor the present moment, all unhappiness and struggle dissolve, and life begins to flow with joy and ease. When you act out the present-moment awareness, whatever you do becomes imbued with a sense of quality, care, and love - even the most simple action.
author: Eckhart Tolle
title: The Power of Now: A Guide to Spiritual Enlightenment

quote: Finding one important thing in your life doesn’t mean you have to
author: Paulo Coelho
title: Brida

quote: Lord, grant me the strength to accept the things I cannot change,
author: Reinhold Niebuhr

quote: To those who abuse: the sin is yours, the crime is yours, and the shame is yours. To those who protect the perpetrators: blaming the victims only masks the evil within, making you as guilty as those who abuse. Stand up for the innocent or go down with the rest.
author: Flora Jessop
title: Church of Lies

quote: Find the things that matter, and hold on to them, and fight for them, and refuse to let them go.
author: Lauren Oliver
title: Delirium

quote: But there were some things I believed in. Some things I had faith in. And faith isn't about perfect attendance to services, or how much money you put on the little plate. It isn't about going skyclad to the Holy Rites, or meditating each day upon the divine.
author: Jim Butcher
title: Changes

quote: All worthy work is open to interpretations the author did not intend. Art isn't your pet -- it's your kid. It grows up and talks back to you.
author: Joss Whedon

quote: Your complaints, your drama, your victim mentality, your whining, your blaming, and all of your excuses have NEVER gotten you even a single step closer to your goals or dreams. Let go of your nonsense. Let go of the delusion that you DESERVE better and go EARN it! Today is a new day!
author: Steve Maraboli
title: Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

quote: Rise to the occassion which is life!
author: Virginia Euwer Wolff

quote: Normalness leads to sadness.
author: Phil Lester

quote: Although my memory's fading, I remember two things very clearly: I am a great sinner and Christ is a great Savior.
author: John Newton
title: Amazing Grace

quote: Do not let those who cannot see the truth tell you who you are. You are the flame that cannot be put out. You are the star that cannot be lost. You are who you have always been, and that is enough and more than enough. Anyone who looks at you and sees darkness is blind.
author: Cassandra Clare
title: Chain of Gold

quote: Whether a thought is spoken or not it is a real thing and it has power," Tuek said. "You might find the line between life and death among the Fremen to be too sharp and quick.
author: Frank Herbert
title: Dune

quote: You have to be the bravest person in the world to go out every day, being yourself when no one likes who you are.
author: Matthew Dicks
title: Memoirs of an Imaginary Friend

quote: I was giving up. I would have given up - if a voice hadn't made itself heard in my heart. The voice said "I will not die. I refuse it. I will make it through this nightmare. I will beat the odds, as great as they are. I have survived so far, miraculously. Now I will turn miracle into routine. The amazing will be seen everyday. I will put in all the hard work necessary. Yes, so long as God is with me, I will not die. Amen.
author: Yann Martel
title: Life of Pi

quote: Hard work beats talent when talent fails to work hard.
author: Kevin Durant

quote: I've missed more than 9000 shots in my career. I've lost almost 300 games. 26 times, I've been trusted to take the game winning shot and missed. I've failed over and over and over again in my life. And that is why I succeed.
author: Michael Jordan

quote: Fault always lies in the same place: with him weak enough to lay blame.
author: Stephen King

quote: It does not matter how slowly you go so long as you do not stop.
author: Andy Warhol

quote: Accepting oneself does not preclude an attempt to become better.
author: Flannery O'Connor

quote: I don't understand dating.. and the other things that people do.. all I know is that you ought to find the one you recognize. The one who gives you four arms, four legs, four eyes, and has the other half of your heart. There's only one of those, so what are all the other things for? Like dating?
author: C. JoyBell C.

quote: When I left Queen's my future seemed to stretch out before me like a straight road. I thought I could see along it for many a milestone. Now there is a bend in it. I don't know what lies around the bend, but I'm going to believe that the best does.
author: Lucy Maud Montgomery
title: Anne of Green Gables

quote: Il n'y a de réalité que dans l'action.
author: Jean-Paul Sartre
title: Existentialism is a Humanism

quote: Life is going to give you just what you put in it. Put your whole heart in everything you do, and pray, then you can wait.
author: Maya Angelou
title: I Know Why the Caged Bird Sings

quote: The best love in the world, is the love of a man. The love of a man who came from your womb, the love of your son! I don't have a daughter, but maybe the love of a daughter is the best, too. I am first and foremost me, but right after that, I am a mother. The best thing that I can ever be, is me. But the best gift that I will ever have, is being a mother.
author: C. JoyBell C.

quote: What did you put in the fire?" Kaladin said. "To make that special smoke?"
author: Brandon Sanderson
title: The Way of Kings

quote: Rules for happiness: something to do, someone to love, something to hope for.
author: Immanuel Kant

quote: Your own positive future begins in this moment. All you have is right now. Every goal is possible from here.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: Fear tends to come from ignorance. Once I knew what the problem was, it was just a problem, nothing to fear.
author: Patrick Rothfuss
title: The Name of the Wind

quote: The great secret of true success, of true happiness, is this: the man or woman who asks for no return, the perfectly unselfish person, is the most successful.
author: Vivekananda

quote: Let us try to teach generosity and altruism, because we are born selfish. Let us understand what our own selfish genes are up to, because we may then at least have the chance to upset their designs, something that no other species has ever aspired to do.
author: Richard Dawkins
title: The Selfish Gene

quote: Complain and remain. Praise and be raised.
author: Joyce Meyer

quote: When one door closes another door opens; but we so often look so long and so regretfully upon the closed door, that we do not see the ones which open for us.
author: Alexander Graham Bell

quote: Life is ours to be spent, not to
author: D.H. Lawrence

quote: An idea is salvation by imagination
author: Frank Lloyd Wright

quote: Wherever men and women are persecuted because of their race, religion, or political views, that place must — at that moment — become the center of the universe.
author: Elie Wiesel

quote: Begin doing what you want to do now. We are not living in eternity. We have only this moment, sparkling like a star in our hand--and melting like a snowflake...
author: Sir Francis Bacon

quote: It is quite a revelation to discover that the place you wanted to escape to is the exact same place you escaped from. That the prison wasn't the place, but the perspective.
author: Matt Haig
title: The Midnight Library

quote: Smile at strangers and you just might change a life.
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: The wish of death had been palpably hanging over this otherwise idyllic paradise for a good many years.
author: John Richard Spencer

quote: Whatever you see you gotta keep a sense of humor; you gotta be able to smile through all the bullshit.
author: Tupac Shakur

quote: Who belonged to no one, who belonged to everyone.
author: Lana Del Rey

quote: One more dance along the razor's edge finished. Almost dead yesterday, maybe dead tomorrow, but alive, gloriously alive, today.
author: Robert Jordan
title: Lord of Chaos

quote: Instead of worrying about what could go wrong, change your thoughts to what could go right. When you change the negative thought into a positive one, it eliminates the negative one.
author: Roy T. Bennett
title: The Light in the Heart

quote: Before I go," he said, and paused -- "I may kiss her?"
author: Charles Dickens
title: A Tale of Two Cities

quote: The adventure of life is to learn.
author: William Arthur Ward

quote: There are a thousand hacking at the branches of evil to one who is striking at the root.
author: Henry David Thoreau
title: Walden, or Life in the Woods

quote: The motive behind criticism often determines its validity. Those who care criticize where necessary. Those who envy criticize the moment they think that they have found a weak spot.
author: Criss Jami
title: Killosophy

quote: It's not that some people have willpower and some don't... It's that some people are ready to change and others are not.
author: James Gordon

quote: Don't ever give up.
author: Richelle E. Goodrich
title: Eena, The Tempter's Snare

quote: I was halfway across America, at the dividing line between the East of my youth and the West of my future.
author: Jack Kerouac
title: On the Road

quote: It’s not over if you’re still here,” Chronicler said. “It’s not a tragedy if you’re still alive.
author: Patrick Rothfuss
title: The Wise Man's Fear

quote: With our thoughts we make the world.
author: Buddha

quote: I know in my heart that man is good, that what is right will always eventually triumph, and there is purpose and worth to each and every life.
author: Ronald Reagan

quote: Happiness is the object and design of our existence; and will be the end thereof, if we pursue the path that leads to it; and this path is virtue, uprightness, faithfulness, holiness, and keeping all the commandments of God.
author: Joseph Smith

quote: There are two things we should always be 1. raw and 2. ready. When you are raw, you are always ready and when you are ready you usually realize that you are raw. Waiting for perfection is not an answer, one cannot say "I will be ready when I am perfect" because then you will never be ready, rather one must say "I am raw and I am ready just like this right now, how and who I am.
author: C. JoyBell C.

quote: If people are going to be allowed to say "we love you" and "I love you", they'd better have the backbone to prove it. Love isn't just a word.
author: C. JoyBell C.

quote: I'm often asked what I think about as I run. Usually the people who ask this have never run long distances themselves. I always ponder the question. What exactly do I think about when I'm running? I don't have a clue.
author: Haruki Murakami
title: What I Talk About When I Talk About Running

quote: Love doesn't always come when you want it to. Sometimes it just happens, despite your will.
author: V.C. Andrews
title: Flowers in the Attic

quote: No man is free who is not master of himself.
author: Epictetus

quote: If you believe you can, you might. If you know you can, you will.
author: Steve Maraboli
title: Life, the Truth, and Being Free

quote: I agree with yours of the 22d that
author: Thomas Jefferson
title: Letters of Thomas Jefferson

quote: What is demanded of man is not, as some existential philosophers teach, to endure the meaninglessness of life, but rather to bear his incapacity to grasp its unconditional meaningfulness in rational terms.
author: Viktor E. Frankl
title: Man's Search for Meaning

quote: IN THE END… We only regret the chances we didn’t take, the relationships we were afraid to have,and the decisions we waited too long to make.
author: Lewis Carroll

quote: People live their lives bound by what they accept as correct and true. That’s how they define Reality. But what does it mean to be “correct” or “true”? Merely vague concepts… Their Reality may all be a mirage. Can we consider them to simply be living in their own world, shaped by their beliefs?
author: Masashi Kishimoto

quote: It doesn’t matter what we are. It matters what we do.
author: Michelle Hodkin
title: The Evolution of Mara Dyer

quote: You don’t get to pick where you’re from, but you always have control of where you’re going.
author: Chris Colfer
title: Struck By Lightning: The Carson Phillips Journal

quote: Somewhere along the way we all go a bit mad. So burn, let go and dive into the horror, because maybe it’s the chaos which helps us find where we belong.
author: robert m drake

quote: Always tell what you feel. Do what you think...
author: Gabriel García Márquez

quote: Jessica. For god's sake," he said. "Allow me to do at least one common courtesy for you. In spite ow what 'women's lib' teaches you, chivalry does not imply that women are powerless. On the contrary, chivalry is an admission of women's superiority. An acknowledgment of
author: Beth Fantaskey
title: Jessica's Guide to Dating on the Dark Side

quote: Wrong will be right, when Aslan comes in sight,
author: C.S. Lewis
title: The Lion, the Witch and the Wardrobe

quote: In this sad world of ours, sorrow comes to all; and, to the young, it comes with bitterest agony, because it takes them unawares. The older have learned to ever expect it. I am anxious to afford some alleviation of your present distress. Perfect relief is not possible, except with time. You can not now realize that you will ever feel better. Is not this so? And yet it is a mistake. You are sure to be happy again. To know this, which is certainly true, will make you some less miserable now. I have had experience enough to know what I say; and you need only to believe it, to feel better at once.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: Why do I have to tell a story?” I asked.
author: Jennifer Lynn Barnes
title: The Inheritance Games

quote: Music is an agreeable harmony for the honor of God and the permissible delights of the soul.
author: Johann Sebastian Bach

quote: Security is mostly a superstition. It does not exist in nature, nor do the children of men as a whole experience it. Avoiding danger is no safer in the long run than outright exposure. Life is either a daring adventure, or nothing.
author: Helen Keller
title: The Open Door

quote: When I get sad, I stop being sad and be awesome instead.
author: Barney Stinson

quote: A child may not know how to feed itself, or what to eat, yet it knows hunger.
author: Daniel Keyes
title: Flowers for Algernon

quote: Success is the ability to go from failure to failure without losing your enthusiasm
author: Winston Churchill

quote: I keep thinking about a tale my nurse used to read to me about a bird whose wings are pinned to the ground. In the end, when he finally frees himself, he flies so high he becomes a star. My nurse said the story was about how we all have something that keeps us down.
author: Shannon Hale
title: Princess Academy

quote: Kecantikan yang abadi terletak pada keelokan adab dan ketinggian ilmu seseorang. Bukan terletak pada wajah dan pakaiannya.
author: Hamka

quote: Success is a lousy teacher. It seduces smart people into thinking they can't lose.
author: Bill Gates

quote: Champions have the courage to keep turning the pages because they know a better chapter lies ahead.
author: Paula White

quote: Truth does not become more true by virtue of the fact that the entire world agrees with it, nor less so even if the whole world disagrees with it.
author: Maimonides
title: The Guide for the Perplexed

quote: My happiness grows in direct proportion to my acceptance, and in inverse proportion to my expectations.
author: Michael J. Fox

quote: The sea's only gifts are harsh blows, and occasionally the chance to feel strong. Now I don't know much about the sea, but I do know that that's the way it is here. And I also know how important it is in life not necessarily to be strong but to feel strong. To measure yourself at least once. To find yourself at least once in the most ancient of human conditions. Facing the blind death stone alone, with nothing to help you but your hands and your own head.
author: Jon Krakauer
title: Into the Wild

quote: Each of us has the right and the responsibility to assess the roads which lie ahead, and those over which we have traveled, and if the future road looms ominous or unpromising, and the roads back uninviting, then we need to gather our resolve and, carrying only the necessary baggage, step off that road into another direction. If the new choice is also unpalatable, without embarrassment, we must be ready to change that as well.
author: Maya Angelou
title: Wouldn't Take Nothing for My Journey Now

quote: you don't have to worry about burning bridges, if you're building your own
author: Kerry E. Wagner

quote: It is harder to crack prejudice than an atom.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Life is and will ever remain an equation incapable of solution, but it contains certain known factors.
author: Nikola Tesla

quote: This is your life. Do what you want and do it often.
author: Holstee Manifesto
title: The Wedding Day

quote: It is not enough to be industrious; so are the ants. What are you industrious about?
author: Henry David Thoreau
title: Letters to Various Persons

quote: You make the world a better place by making daily improvements to become the best version of yourself.
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: And so I wait. I wait for time to heal the pain and raise me to me feet once again - so that I can start a new path, my own path, the one that will make me whole again.
author: Jack Canfield
title: Chicken Soup for the Teenage Soul II

quote: I always cheer up immensely if an attack is particularly wounding because I think, well, if they attack one personally, it means they have not a single political argument left.
author: Margaret Thatcher

quote: If people reach perfection they vanish, you know.
author: T.H. White
title: The Once and Future King

quote: You could do a lot worse.
author: Suzanne Collins
title: Catching Fire

quote: To touch the soul of another human being is to walk on holy ground.
author: Stephen Covey

quote: An education is not so much about making a living as making a person.
author: Tara Westover
title: Educated

quote: Never stop. Never stop fighting. Never stop dreaming.
author: Tom Hiddleston

quote: Maybe some things aren't meant to be known. maybe there just meant to be accepted.
author: Wendy Mass
title: Jeremy Fink and the Meaning of Life

quote: Travel is never a matter of money but of courage
author: Paulo Coelho
title: Aleph

quote: Good works is giving to the poor and the helpless, but divine works is showing them their worth to the One who matters.
author: Criss Jami
title: Killosophy

quote: A bird is safe in its nest - but that is not what its wings are made for.
author: Amit Ray
title: World Peace: The Voice of a Mountain Bird

quote: Go for it, while you can. I know you have it in you. And I can't promise you'll get everything you want, but I can promise nothing will change if you don't try.
author: J.M. Darhower
title: Sempre

quote: To those who will see, the world waits.
author: Libba Bray

quote: To progress in life, I don’t focus on how much I have done but on how much I have yet to do.
author: Idowu Koyenikan
title: Wealth for all Africans: How Every African Can Live the Life of Their Dreams

quote: When men are pure, laws are useless; when men are corrupt, laws are broken.
author: Benjamin Disraeli

quote: Wait long enough and people will surprise and impress. When you're pissed off at someone and you're angry at them, you just haven't given them enough time. Just give them a little more time and they almost always will impress you.
author: Randy Pausch

quote: Be not afraid of life. Believe that life is worth living, and your belief will help create the fact.
author: William James
title: The Will to Believe : and Other Essays in Popular Philosophy

quote: Til shade is gone,
author: Robert Jordan
title: The Dragon Reborn

quote: Sometimes to self-discover you must self-destruct.
author: robert m drake

quote: However beautiful the strategy, you should occasionally look at the results.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: When people see some things as beautiful,
author: Lao Tzu
title: Tao Te Ching

quote: What helps you persevere is your resilience and commitment.
author: Roy T. Bennett
title: The Light in the Heart

quote: Life is like a play: it's not the length, but the excellence of the acting that matters.
author: Seneca

quote: Plants are more courageous than almost all human beings: an orange tree would rather die than produce lemons, whereas instead of dying the average person would rather be someone they are not.
author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quote: Nothing happens while you live. The scenery changes, people come in and go out, that's all. There are no beginnings. Days are tacked on to days without rhyme or reason, an interminable, monotonous addition.
author: Jean-Paul Sartre
title: Nausea

quote: There's no limit to what you can dream. You
author: Cecelia Ahern

quote: Your world is a living expression of how you are using and have used your mind.
author: Earl Nightingale

quote: If you do what you've always done, you'll get what you've always gotten.
author: Tony Robbins

quote: You can't dwell on what might have been...and it's not fair to condemn him for something he hasn't done.
author: Wendelin Van Draanen
title: Flipped

quote: Who we are in the present includes who we were in the past.
author: Fred Rogers
title: Life's Journeys According to Mister Rogers: Things to Remember Along the Way

quote: It's very dramatic when two people come together to work something out. It's easy to take a gun and annihilate your opposition, but what is really exciting to me is to see people with differing views come together and finally respect each other.
author: Fred Rogers
title: The World According to Mister Rogers: Important Things to Remember

quote: A gentleman is someone who does not what he wants to do, but what he should do.
author: Haruki Murakami
title: Norwegian Wood

quote: The consequences of every act are included in the act itself.
author: George Orwell

quote: Listen to what you know instead of what you fear.
author: Richard Bach

quote: I am not worried, Harry," said Dumbledore, his voice a little stronger despite the freezing water. "I am with you.
author: J.K. Rowling
title: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince

quote: Be ruthless about protecting writing days, i.e., do not cave in to endless requests to have "essential" and "long overdue" meetings on those days. The funny thing is that, although writing has been my actual job for several years now, I still seem to have to fight for time in which to do it. Some people do not seem to grasp that I still have to sit down in peace and write the books, apparently believing that they pop up like mushrooms without my connivance. I must therefore guard the time allotted to writing as a Hungarian Horntail guards its firstborn egg.
author: J.K. Rowling

quote: Forgive yourself before you die. Then forgive others.
author: Mitch Albom
title: Tuesdays with Morrie

quote: Someday is now.
author: Gaddy Bergmann

quote: Never bend your head. Hold it high. Look the world straight in the eye.
author: Helen Keller

quote: Come friends, it's not too late to seek a newer world.
author: Alfred Lord Tennyson

quote: What if the kid you bullied at school, grew up, and turned out to be the only surgeon who could save your life?
author: Lynette Mather

quote: Everything that is done in this world is done by hope.
author: Martin Luther

quote: You think of yourself
author: Rumi
title: Hush, Don't Say Anything to God: Passionate Poems of Rumi

quote: You are never alone. You are eternally connected with everyone.
author: Amit Ray
title: Meditation: Insights and Inspirations

quote: Of all the wonders that I have heard,
author: William Shakespeare
title: Julius Caesar

quote: One must always be prepared for riotous and endless waves of transformation.
author: Elizabeth Gilbert
title: Eat, Pray, Love

quote: All human beings should try to learn before they die what they are running from, and to, and why.
author: James Thurber

quote: Try, reach, want, and you may fall. But even if you do, you might be okay anyway.
author: Ann Brashares
title: Girls in Pants: The Third Summer of the Sisterhood

quote: Wherever the art of Medicine is loved, there is also a love of Humanity.
author: Hippocrates

quote: When you say "I" and "my" too much, you lose the capacity to understand the "we" and "our".
author: Steve Maraboli
title: Life, the Truth, and Being Free

quote: What hurts us is what heals us
author: Paulo Coelho
title: Aleph

quote: Your inner strength is your outer foundation
author: Allan Rufus

quote: Where your talents and the needs of the world cross, there lies your vocation.
author: Aristotle

quote: Silence is argument carried out by other means.
author: Ernesto "Che" Guevara

quote: And if these mountains had eyes, they would wake to find two strangers in their fences, standing in admiration as a breathing red pours its tinge upon earth's shore. These mountains, which have seen untold sunrises, long to thunder praise but stand reverent, silent so that man's weak praise should be given God's attention.
author: Donald Miller
title: Through Painted Deserts: Light, God, and Beauty on the Open Road

quote: To every problem, there is a most simple solution.
author: Agatha Christie
title: The Clocks

quote: There are scores of people waiting for someone just like us to come along; people who will appreciate our compassion, our encouragement, who will need our unique talents. Someone who will live a happier life merely because we took the time to share what we had to give.
author: Leo Buscaglia

quote: It`s not how old you are, it`s how you are old.
author: Jules Renard

quote: It is said that God has created man in his own image. But it may be that humankind has created God in the image of humankind.
author: Thich Nhat Hanh
title: Going Home: Jesus and Buddha as Brothers

quote: karapatan kong madapa at bumangon sa buhay nang walang tatawa, magagalit, magtatanong, o magbibilang kung ilang beses na 'kong nagkamali at ilang ulit ako dapat bumawi
author: Bob Ong
title: ABNKKBSNPLAKo?!

quote: The mistake ninety-nine percent of humanity made, as far as Fats could see, was being ashamed of what they were; lying about it, trying to be somebody else.
author: J.K. Rowling
title: The Casual Vacancy

quote: Never apologize for showing feeling. When you do so, you apologize for the truth.
author: Benjamin Disraeli

quote: The sky is the limit... for some people aim higher nothing is impossible.
author: Demi Lovato

quote: You attract who you are being. When you work at being the type of person that you want to attract, you attract those kinds of people into your life.
author: Roy T. Bennett
title: The Light in the Heart

quote: Everything is determined, the beginning as well as the end, by forces over which we have no control. It is determined for the insect, as well as for the star. Human beings, vegetables, or cosmic dust, we all dance to a mysterious tune, intoned in the distance by an invisible piper.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: You enter the forest
author: Joseph Campbell
title: The Hero's Journey: Joseph Campbell on His Life & Work

quote: Run when you can, walk if you have to, crawl if you must; just never give up.
author: Dean Karnazes

quote: At the moment of commitment the entire universe conspires to assist you.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: Two wrongs don't make a right, but don't three lefts make a right? Two wrongs don't make a right, but don't two negatives make a positive?
author: Andrew Clements
title: Things Not Seen

quote: Every adversity, every failure, every heartache carries with it the seed of an equal or greater benefit.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: According to this law [the law of Dharma], you have a unique talent and a unique way of expressing it. There is something that you can do better than anyone else in the whole world--and for every unique talent and unique expression of that talent, there are also unique needs. When these needs are matched with the creative expression of your talent, that is the spark that creates affluence. Expressing your talents to fulfill needs creates unlimited wealth and abundance.
author: Deepak Chopra

quote: None of us will ever accomplish anything excellent or commanding except when he listens to this whisper which is heard by him alone.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Whatsoever a man soweth, that shall he also reap.
author: Anonymous
title: The Holy Bible: King James Version

quote: Keep good company, read good books, love good things and cultivate soul and body as faithfully as you can.
author: Louisa May Alcott
title: Rose in Bloom

quote: Believe in yourself and all that you are. Know that there is something inside you that is greater than any obstacle.
author: Christian D. Larson

quote: A tamed woman will never leave her mark in the world.
author: robert m drake

quote: Distance can ruin even the best of intentions.
author: Nicholas Sparks
title: The Rescue

quote: If you just sit and observe, you will see how restless your mind is. If you try to calm it, it only makes it worse, but over time it does calm, and when it does, there's room to hear more subtle things - that's when your intuition starts to blossom and you start to see things more clearly and be in the present more. Your mind just slows down, and you see a tremendous expanse in the moment. You see so much more than you could see before. It's a discipline; you have to practice it.
author: Walter Isaacson
title: Steve Jobs

quote: In the external scheme of things, shining moments are as brief as the twinkling of an eye, yet such twinklings are what eternity is made of -- moments when we human beings can say "I love you," "I'm proud of you," "I forgive you," "I'm grateful for you." That's what eternity is made of: invisible imperishable good stuff.
author: Fred Rogers
title: The World According to Mister Rogers: Important Things to Remember

quote: Do you train for passing tests or do you train for creative inquiry?
author: Noam Chomsky

quote: In his suicide note, Kurt Cobain wrote, "It's better to burn out than to fade away." He was quoting a Neil Young song about Johnny Rotten of the Sex Pistols. When I was twenty-four, I interviewed John Lennon. I asked him about this sentiment, one that pervades rock and roll. He took strong, outraged exception to it. "It's better to fade away like an old soldier than to burn out, " he said. "I worship people who survive. I'll take the living and the healthy.
author: David Sheff
title: Beautiful Boy: A Father's Journey Through His Son's Addiction

quote: He asked, 'Croesus, who told you to attack my land and meet me as an enemy instead of a friend?'
author: Herodotus
title: The Histories

quote: Heaven is comfort, but it's still not living.
author: Alice Sebold
title: The Lovely Bones

quote: We have just enough religion to make us hate, but not enough to make us love one another.
author: Jonathan Swift

quote: Do the kind of things that come from the heart, When you do, you won't be dissatisfied, you won't be envious, you won't be longing for somebody else's things. On the contrary, you'll be overhelmed with what comes back
author: Morrie Schwartz

quote: The nights you fight best are
author: Charles Bukowski

quote: Most lives are not distinguished by great achievements. They are measured by an infinite number of small ones. Each time you do a kindness for someone or bring a smile to his face, it gives your life meaning. Never doubt your value, little friend. The world would be a dismal place without you in it. (tweaked version of a passage from Scandal in Spring)
author: Lisa Kleypas
title: Scandal in Spring

quote: Life is suffering
author: Jordan B. Peterson

quote: You’ve got to think about big things while you’re doing small things, so that all the small things go in the right direction.
author: Alvin Toffler

quote: The future was one thing that could never be broken, because it had not yet had the chance to be anything.
author: Sarah Dessen
title: Saint Anything

quote: If you have kindness in your heart, you offer acts of kindness to touch the hearts of others wherever you go—whether they are random or planned. Kindness becomes a way of life.
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: If people make fun of you, that probably means you're doing something right.
author: Evanescence

quote: Life has no victims. There are no victims in this life.
author: C. JoyBell C.
title: The Sun Is Snowing: Poetry & Prose by C. Joybell C

quote: The opinion which other people have of you is their problem, not yours.
author: Elisabeth Kübler-Ross
title: On Life after Death

quote: Believe in your infinite potential. Your only limitations are those you set upon yourself.
author: Roy T. Bennett
title: The Light in the Heart

quote: If you fail to plan, you are planning to fail!
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: You can't always judge people by the things they done. You got to judge them by what they are doing now.
author: Kate DiCamillo
title: Because of Winn-Dixie

quote: We cannot have a world where everyone is a victim. "I'm this way because my father made me this way. I'm this way because my husband made me this way." Yes, we are indeed formed by traumas that happen to us. But then you must take charge, you must take over, you are responsible.
author: Camille Paglia

quote: Three passions, simple but overwhelmingly strong, have governed my life: the longing for love, the search for knowledge, and unbearable pity for the suffering of mankind. These passions, like great winds, have blown me hither and thither, in a wayward course, over a great ocean of anguish, reaching to the very verge of despair.
author: Bertrand Russell

quote: There is no evidence that we've been placed on this planet to be especially happy or especially normal. And in fact our unhappiness and our strangeness, our anxieties and compulsions, those least fashionable aspects of our personalities, are quite often what lead us to do rather interesting things.
author: Jon Ronson
title: The Psychopath Test: A Journey Through the Madness Industry

quote: Great spirits have always encountered violent opposition from mediocre minds. The mediocre mind is incapable of understanding the man who refuses to bow blindly to conventional prejudices and chooses instead to express his opinions courageously and honestly.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: The aim of every artist is to arrest motion, which is life, by artificial means and hold it fixed so that a hundred years later, when a stranger looks at it, it moves again since it is life.
author: William Faulkner

quote: Have you ever felt the longing for someone you could admire? For something, not to look down at, but up to?
author: Ayn Rand

quote: As long as you have life and breath, believe. Believe for those who cannot. Believe even if you have stopped believing. Believe for the sake of the dead, for love, to keep your heart beating, believe. Never give up, never despair, let no mystery confound you into the conclusion that mystery cannot be yours.
author: Mark Helprin
title: A Soldier of the Great War

quote: What we love determines what we seek. What we seek determines what we think and do. What we think and do determines who we are — and who we will become.
author: Dieter F. Uchtdorf

quote: There are some values that you should never compromise on to stay true to yourself; you should be brave to stand up for what you truly believe in even if you stand alone.
author: Roy T. Bennett
title: The Light in the Heart

quote: Every challenge you face today makes you stronger tomorrow. The challenge of life is intended to make you better, not bitter.
author: Roy T. Bennett
title: The Light in the Heart

quote: Mimpi-mimpi kamu, cita-cita kamu, keyakinan kamu, apa yang kamu mau kejar, biarkan ia menggantung, mengambang 5 centimeter di depan kening kamu. Jadi dia nggak akan pernah lepas dari mata kamu. Dan kamu bawa mimpi dan keyakinan kamu itu setiap hari, kamu lihat setiap hari, dan percaya bahwa kamu bisa.
author: Donny Dhirgantoro

quote: Friends can make you feel that the world is smaller and less sneaky than it really is, because you know people who have similar experiences.
author: Lemony Snicket
title: The Austere Academy

quote: The treacherous are ever distrustful.
author: J.R.R. Tolkien
title: The Two Towers

quote: Thou shalt not be a victim, thou shalt not be a perpetrator, but, above all, thou shalt not be a bystander.
author: Yehuda Bauer

quote: Do nothing, and nothing happens. Life is about decisions. You either make them or they're made for you, but you can't avoid them.
author: Mhairi McFarlane
title: You Had Me At Hello

quote: Because I trust in the ever-changing climate of the heart. (At least, today I feel that way.) I think it is necessary to have many experiences for the sake of feeling something; for the sake of being challenged, and for the sake of being expressive, to offer something to someone else, to learn what we are capable of.
author: Jason Mraz

quote: Sad stories make good books
author: Khaled Hosseini
title: The Kite Runner

quote: My name is Salmon, like the fish; first name, Susie. I was fourteen when I was murdered.
author: Alice Sebold
title: The Lovely Bones

quote: If we don't change the direction we are headed, we will end up where we are going.
author: Jodi Picoult
title: Nineteen Minutes

quote: Successful people have libraries. The rest have big screen TVs
author: Jim Rohn

quote: Its more fun to think of the future than dwell on the past.
author: Sara Shepard
title: Unbelievable

quote: We may have all come on different ships, but we're in the same boat now.
author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quote: And people who don’t dream, who don’t have any kind of imaginative life, they must… they must go nuts. I can’t imagine that.
author: Stephen King

quote: Great goals make great people. People cannot hit what they do not aim for.
author: Roy T. Bennett
title: The Light in the Heart

quote: Too much sanity may be madness — and maddest of all: to see life as it is, and not as it should be!
author: Dale Wasserman
title: Man of La Mancha: A Musical Play

quote: Death twitches my ear;
author: Virgil

quote: Give me the Love that leads the way
author: Amy Carmichael

quote: No great wisdom can be reached without sacrifice.
author: C.S. Lewis
title: The Magician's Nephew

quote: If every life is a river, then it's little wonder that we do not even notice the changes that occur until we are far out in the darkest sea. One day you look around and nothing is familiar, not even your own face.
author: Alice Hoffman
title: Incantation

quote: It is better to be respected than it is to be popular. Popularity ends on yearbook day, but respect lasts forever.
author: John Bytheway

quote: Life is a series of surprises and would not be worth taking or keeping if it were not.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Therefore I would ask you to write all kinds of books, hesitating at no subject however trivial or however vast. By hook or by crook, I hope that you will possess yourselves of money enough to travel and to idle, to contemplate the future or the past of the world, to dream over books and loiter at street corners and let the line of thought dip deep into the stream.
author: Virginia Woolf
title: A Room of One’s Own

quote: Every moment of light and dark is a miracle.
author: Walt Whitman

quote: Try to remember it always," he said once Gogol had reached him, leading him slowly back across the breakwater, to where his mother and Sonia stood waiting. "Remember that you and I made this journey together to a place where there was nowhere left to go.
author: Jhumpa Lahiri
title: The Namesake

quote: You’re only poor if you give up. The most important thing is that you did something. Most people only talk and dream of getting rich. You’ve done something.
author: Robert T. Kiyosaki
title: Rich Dad, Poor Dad

quote: Rule your mind or it will rule you.
author: Horace

quote: He who jumps into the void owes no explanation to those who stand and watch.
author: Jean-Luc Godard

quote: Look not mournfully into the past, it comes not back again. Wisely improve the present, it is thine. Go forth to meet the shadowy future without fear and with a manly heart.
author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quote: We crave for new sensations but soon become indifferent to them. The wonders of yesterday are today common occurrences
author: Nikola Tesla
title: My Inventions

quote: My dear Watson," said [Sherlock Holmes], "I cannot agree with those who rank modesty among the virtues. To the logician all things should be seen exactly as they are, and to underestimate one's self is as much a departure from truth as to exaggerate one's own powers.
author: Arthur Conan Doyle
title: The Adventure of the Greek Interpreter (The Memoirs of Sherlock Holmes, #9 )

quote: Humans have come into being for the sake of each other, so either teach them, or learn to bear them.
author: Marcus Aurelius
title: Meditations

quote: you must be careful never to allow doubt to paralyze you. always take the decisions you need to take, even if you're not sure you're doing the right thing. You'll never go wrong if, when you make a decision, you keep in mind an old German proverb: 'The devil is in the detail.' Remember that proverb and you'll always be able to turn a wrong decision into a right one.
author: Paulo Coelho
title: Brida

quote: I know that the molecules in my body are traceable to phenomena in the cosmos. That makes me want to grab people on the street and say: ‘Have you HEARD THIS?
author: Neil deGrasse Tyson

quote: You cannot stay on the summit forever; you have to come down again. So why bother in the first place? Just this: What is above knows what is below, but what is below does not know what is above. One climbs, one sees. One descends, one sees no longer, but one has seen. There is an art of conducting oneself in the lower regions by the memory of what one saw higher up. When one can no longer see, one can at least still know.
author: Rene Daumal

quote: I want to be like Gandhi and Martin Luther King and John Lennon but i want to STAY ALIVE.
author: Madonna

quote: I cannot pretend I am without fear. But my predominant feeling is one of gratitude. I have loved and been loved; I have been given much and I have given something in return; I have read and traveled and thought and written. I have had an intercourse with the world, the special intercourse of writers and readers.
author: Oliver Sacks
title: Gratitude

quote: It's total bullshit," he said. "The whole thing. Eighty percent survival rate and he's in the twenty percent? Bullshit. He was such a bright kid. It's bullshit. I hate it. But it was sure a privilege to love him, huh?
author: John Green
title: The Fault in Our Stars

quote: Live life as though nobody is watching, and express yourself as though everyone is listening.
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: Stand up and walk. Move on. After all, you have perfect legs to stand on.
author: Arakawa Hiromu

quote: If you want something you can have it, but only if you want everything that goes with it, including all the hard work and the despair, and only if you're willing to risk failure.
author: Philip Pullman
title: Clockwork

quote: After all, you can't truly be happy if you've never known pain. You can't truly feel joy if you've never felt heartbreak. You can't know what it's like to be filled unless you've been empty.
author: Kelly Cutrone
title: If You Have to Cry, Go Outside: And Other Things Your Mother Never Told You

quote: I hope to write someday and that’s even more terrifying than performing. You don’t just entertain the audience, you give them little bits of your soul.
author: Chris Colfer

quote: When blame and self-judgement are transformed, healed, and cease to be, we have reawakened without the myth, the mythos, of separation. We are One.
author: Wendy E. Slater
title: Into the Hearth, Poems-Volume 14

quote: We lay there and looked up at the night sky and she told me about stars called blue squares and red swirls and I told her I'd never heard of them. Of course not, she said, the really important stuff they never tell you. You have to imagine it on your own.
author: Brian Andreas

quote: Let us pick up our books and our pens, they are the most powerful weapons.
author: Malala Yousafzai
title: I Am Malala: The Story of the Girl Who Stood Up for Education and Was Shot by the Taliban

quote: I think that I shall never see
author: Joyce Kilmer
title: Trees & Other Poems

quote: Many persons have a wrong idea of what constitutes true happiness. It is not attained through self-gratification but through fidelity to a worthy purpose.
author: Helen Keller

quote: Bring something incomprehensible into the world!
author: Gilles Deleuze
title: A Thousand Plateaus: Capitalism and Schizophrenia

quote: All I ask is this: Do something. Try something. Speaking out, showing up, writing a letter, a check, a strongly worded e-mail. Pick a cause – there are few unworthy ones. And nudge yourself past the brink of tacit support to action. Once a month, once a year, or just once...Even just learning enough about a subject so you can speak against an opponent eloquently makes you an unusual personage. Start with that. Any one of you would have cried out, would have intervened, had you been in that crowd in Bashiqa. Well thanks to digital technology, you’re all in it now.
author: Joss Whedon

quote: To love is easy, to be in a relationship is extremely difficult.
author: Santosh Kalwar
title: Quote Me Everyday

quote: Action springs not from thought, but from a readiness for responsibility.
author: Dietrich Bonhoeffer

quote: If I am the pawn of the gods, it is because they know me so well, not because they make my mind up for me.
author: Megan Whalen Turner
title: The Queen of Attolia

quote: Go on, get out! Last words are for fools who haven't said enough!
author: Karl Marx

quote: Everything you'll ever need to know is within you; the secrets of the universe are imprinted on the cells of your body.
author: Dan Millman
title: Way of the Peaceful Warrior: A Book That Changes Lives

quote: A writer must teach himself that the basest of all things is to be afraid.
author: William Faulkner

quote: And though I have the gift of prophecy, and understand all mysteries, and all knowledge; and though I have all faith, so that I could remove mountains, but have not love, I am nothing.
author: Anonymous
title: Holy Bible: The New King James Version

quote: You say freak, I say unique.
author: Christian Baloga

quote: You have two choices, to conquer your fear or to let your fear conquer you.
author: Roy T. Bennett
title: The Light in the Heart

quote: If you have the guts to be yourself, other people'll pay your price.
author: John Updike
title: Rabbit, Run

quote: How sweet is the assurance, how comforting is the peace that come from the knowledge that if we marry right and live right, our relationship will continue, notwithstanding the certainty of death and the passage of time. Men may write love songs and sing them. They may yearn and hope and dream. But all of this will be only a romantic longing unless there is an exercise of authority that transcends the powers of time and death.
author: Gordon B. Hinckley

quote: Maybe 'Okay' will be our 'always'...
author: John Green
title: The Fault in Our Stars

quote: You have come a long way and have won many battles. Whenever you’re faced with a difficult or challenging situation, you’ll overcome it. Yes, you can.
author: Roy T. Bennett
title: The Light in the Heart

quote: Don't chase people. Be yourself, do your own thing and work hard. The right people - the ones who really belong in your life - will come to your. And stay.
author: Will Smith

quote: Be like the flower that gives its fragrance to even the hand that crushes it.
author: Imam Ali

quote: You need just the right amount of 'Fuck the world' and the right amount of belief in something...and you need the right amount of love.
author: Gerard Way

quote: I believe in the hands that work, in the brains that think, and in the hearts that love...I believe in sunshine, fresh air, friendship, calm sleep, beautiful thoughts.
author: Elbert Hubbard

quote: Most people die with their music still locked up inside them.
author: Benjamin Disraeli

quote: Even if you don't have all the things you want, be grateful for the things you don't have that you don't want (Bob Dylan's dad)
author: Bob Dylan
title: Chronicles, Volume One

quote: Freedom is...the right to write the wrong words.
author: Patti Smith

quote: Let us pick up our books and our pens,” I said. “They are our most powerful weapons. One child, one teacher, one book and one pen can change the world.
author: Malala Yousafzai
title: I Am Malala: The Story of the Girl Who Stood Up for Education and Was Shot by the Taliban

quote: The best kind of humans are the ones who stay.
author: robert m drake

quote: Protect your enthusiasm from the negativity and fear of others. Never decide to do nothing just because you can only do little. Do what you can. You would be surprised at what "little" acts have done for our world.
author: Steve Maraboli
title: Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

quote: Nobody steals books but your friends.
author: Roger Zelazny
title: The Guns of Avalon

quote: Be so strong that nothing can disturb your peace of mind. Talk health, happiness, and prosperity to every person you meet. Make all your friends feel there is something special in them. Look at the sunny side of everything. Think only the best, be as enthusiastic about the success of others as you are about your own.
author: Norman Vincent Peale

quote: If you don’t like the road you’re walking, start paving another one.
author: Dolly Parton

quote: Death comes to us all; we can only choose how to face it when it comes.
author: Robert Jordan
title: The Dragon Reborn

quote: We cannot change what we are not aware of, and once we are aware, we cannot help but change.
author: Sheryl Sandberg
title: Lean In: Women, Work, and the Will to Lead

quote: Make today worth remembering.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: Life consists of two days, one for you one against you. So when it's for you don't be proud or reckless, and when it's against you be patient, for both days are test for you.
author: Hazrat Ali Ibn Abu-Talib A.S

quote: A photographer is like a cod, which produces a million eggs in order that one may reach maturity.
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: Right now, we're living in an ugly chapter of our lives, but books always get better!
author: Chris Colfer
title: The Wishing Spell

quote: If you let lesser people determine your self-worth, you'll never reach higher than their limited imagination.
author: Ana Huang
title: Twisted Love

quote: Your children are not your children. They are the sons and daughters of Life's longing for itself...
author: Kahlil Gibran

quote: Don't look to the approval of others for your mental stability
author: Karl Lagerfeld

quote: Make the most of what you have and keep your standards high. Never settle for anything less than you deserve or are capable of achieving.
author: Roy T. Bennett
title: The Light in the Heart

quote: Sisters in battle, I am shield and blade to you. As I breathe, your enemies will know no sanctuary. While I live, your cause is mine.
author: Leigh Bardugo
title: Wonder Woman: Warbringer

quote: For a moment everything was clear, and when that happens you see that the world is barely there at all. Don't we all secretly know this? It's a perfectly balanced mechanism of shouts and echoes pretending to be wheels and cogs, a dreamclock chiming beneath a mystery-glass we call life. Behind it? Below it and around it? Chaos, storms. Men with hammers, men with knives, men with guns. Women who twist what they cannot dominate and belittle what they cannot understand. A universe of horror and loss surrounding a single lighted stage where mortals dance in defiance of the dark.
author: Stephen King

quote: Life keeps throwing me lemons because I make the best lemonade...
author: King James Gadsden

quote: Differences are not intended to separate, to alienate. We are different precisely in order to realize our need of one another.
author: desmond tutu

quote: We carry about us the burden of what thousands of people have said and the memories of all our misfortunes. To abandon all that is to be alone, and the mind that is alone is not only innocent but young -- not in time or age, but young, innocent, alive at whatever age -- and only such a mind can see that which is truth and that which is not measurable by words.
author: J. Krishnamurti

quote: Your greatest self has been waiting your whole life; don't make it wait any longer.
author: Steve Maraboli
title: Life, the Truth, and Being Free

quote: Judging is preventing us from understanding a new truth. Free yourself from the rules of old judgments and create the space for new understanding.
author: Steve Maraboli
title: Life, the Truth, and Being Free

quote: How does one become a butterfly? They have to want to learn to fly so much that you are willing to give up being a caterpillar.
author: Trina Paulus
title: Hope for the Flowers

quote: If you are a dreamer come in
author: Shel Silverstein

quote: Day after day, day after day,
author: Samuel Taylor Coleridge
title: The Rime of the Ancient Mariner

quote: If you fuel your journey on the opinions of others, you are going to run out of gas.
author: Steve Maraboli
title: Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

quote: Love your life. Because your life is what you have to give.
author: Tom Hiddleston

quote: ...mencintai itu, kadang mengumpulkan segala tabiat menyebalkan dari seseorang yang engkau cintai, memakinya, merasa tak sanggup lagi menjadi yang terbaik untuk dirinya, dan berpikir tak ada lagi jalan kembali, tapi tetap saja engkau tak sanggup benar-benar meninggalkannya.
author: Tasaro
title: Muhammad: Lelaki Penggenggam Hujan

quote: Nobody gets praised for the right reasons.
author: Diana Wynne Jones
title: Castle in the Air

quote: We all have negative thoughts now and then, but we can choose not to dwell there and not to let them control us.
author: Roy T. Bennett
title: The Light in the Heart

quote: Keep your promises and be consistent. Be the kind of person others can trust.
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: Instead of complaining about the problem and blaming others, start finding the solution.
author: Roy T. Bennett
title: The Light in the Heart

quote: Leaders must be close enough to relate to others, but far enough ahead to motivate them.
author: John C. Maxwell

quote: I am so, so alive.
author: Maggie Stiefvater
title: The Scorpio Races

quote: She liked being reminded of butterflies. She remembered being six or seven and crying over the fates of the butterflies in her yard after learning that they lived for only a few days. Her mother had comforted her and told her not to be sad for the butterflies, that just because their lives were short didn't mean they were tragic. Watching them flying in the warm sun among the daisies in their garden, her mother had said to her, see, they have a beautiful life. Alice liked remembering that.
author: Lisa Genova
title: Still Alice

quote: How would your life be different if…You approached all relationships with authenticity and honesty? Let today be the day…You dedicate yourself to building relationships on the solid foundation of truth and authenticity.
author: Steve Maraboli
title: Life, the Truth, and Being Free

quote: Achievement has no color
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: The most powerful relationship you will ever have is the relationship with yourself.
author: Steve Maraboli
title: Life, the Truth, and Being Free

quote: Help" is a prayer that is always answered. It doesn't matter how you pray--with your head bowed in silence, or crying out in grief, or dancing. Churches are good for prayer, but so are garages and cars and mountains and showers and dance floors. Years ago I wrote an essay that began, "Some people think that God is in the details, but I have come to believe that God is in the bathroom.
author: Anne Lamott
title: Plan B: Further Thoughts on Faith

quote: She was beautiful, but not like those girls in magazines. She was beautiful, for the way she thought. She was beautiful, for the sparkle in her eyes when she talked about something she loved. She was beautiful, for her ability to make other people smile, even if she was sad. No, she wasn't beautiful for something as temporary as her looks. She was beautiful, deep down to her soul. She is beautiful.
author: F Scott Fitzgerald

quote: In my deepest wound I saw your glory, and it dazzled me.
author: St. Augustine

quote: Meditation is a way for nourishing and blossoming the divinity within you.
author: Amit Ray
title: Meditation: Insights and Inspirations

quote: She remembered who she was
author: Lalah Delia

quote: Every window in Alcatraz has a view of San Francisco.
author: Susanna Kaysen
title: Girl, Interrupted

quote: I lied and said I was busy.
author: Brittin Oakman

quote: A smooth sea never made a skilled sailor.
author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quote: One of the best ways to influence people is to make them feel important. Most people enjoy those rare moments when others make them feel important. It is one of the deepest human desires.
author: Roy T. Bennett
title: The Light in the Heart

quote: If we bear all this suffering and if there are still Jews left, when it is over, then Jews, instead of being doomed, will be held up as an example.
author: Anne Frank

quote: Truly powerful people have great humility. They do not try to impress, they do not try to be influential. They simply are. People are magnetically drawn to them. They are most often very silent and focused, aware of their core selves. ... They never persuade, nor do they use manipulation or aggressiveness to get their way. They listen. If there is anything they can offer to assist you, they offer it; if not, they are silent.
author: Sanaya Roman
title: Living with Joy: Keys to Personal Power and Spiritual Transformation

quote: Live all you can: it's a mistake not to. It doesn't matter what you do in particular, so long as you have had your life. If you haven't had that, what have you had?
author: Henry James
title: The Ambassadors

quote: The road to enlightenment is long and difficult, and you should try not to forget snacks and magazines.
author: Anne Lamott
title: Traveling Mercies: Some Thoughts on Faith

quote: You don't have to make something that people call art. Living is an artistic activity, there is an art to getting through the day.
author: viggo mortensen

quote: What fire does not destroy, it hardens
author: Oscar Wilde
title: The Picture of Dorian Gray

quote: In essence, if we want to direct our lives, we must take control of our consistent actions. It's not what we do once in a while that shapes our lives, but what we do consistently.
author: Anthony Robbins

quote: The best discoveries always happened to the people who weren't looking for it. Columbus and America. Pinzon, who stumbled on Brazil while looking for the West Indies. Stanley happening on Victoria Falls. And you. Amy Curry, when I was least expecting her.
author: Morgan Matson
title: Amy & Roger's Epic Detour

quote: Ignore all hatred and criticism. Live for what you create, and die protecting it.
author: Lady Gaga
